Since the Ho Chi Minh plant serves customers exceeding 200,000 kWh per month, it is highly likely to be included in the pilot program. Response: SEHC should consult with Vietnam's EVN as soon as possible to assess the impact of the two-part tariff. It is also urgent to review energy management efficiency and expand solar power facilities. Actions: ① Discuss the schedule and rate levels for the pilot application of the two-part tariff system with the local team at SEHC, EVN (deadline: January 31, 2026); ② Establish a plan to optimize the power demand of the Ho Chi Minh City factory and manage peak and off-peak hours; ③ Analyze the feasibility of investment in solar power and energy storage (ESS) (deadline: February 28, 2026); (Priority: Medium; Deadline: February 1, 2026). References: Vietnam government announcement +1, Vietnam local media +1, EVN +1
Tag_en: vietnam, Electricity bill, restructuring, SEHC, energy

Title: 환율 1,464원 약세 약화
Summary: USD/KRW가 1,464원대까지 내렸어요. 1월 22일 기준 1,464.36원인데, 1월 초 1,443원 대비 +1.4%지만 월 중 최고 1,478원 대비 내린 상태예요. 트럼프의 관세 철회 발표로 달러 약세 신호가 나타나고 있어요. 삼성 관점: 환율 약세 약화(강세 둔화) 신호는 수입 원자재비 상승 속도 완화 의미예요. 다만 1월 말 FOMC 결정(1월 29일 새벽 4시) 이전까지 변동성 클 수 있어요. 협력사 환율 민감도는 HRC(철강), 구리에 집중 필요해요. 액션: ① FOMC 발표 후(1월 29일) 환율 추세 재분석 ② 협력사 가격 협상 시뮬레이션(환율 1,420/1,460/1,500원 시나리오) ③ 환율 변동폭 축소 시 수입비 절감 기회 검토 (기한 2026-01-31) (우선순위: 중, 기한: 2026-01-31). 참고: 한국은행+1, Reuters+1
Title_en: The exchange rate weakened to 1,464 won
Summary_en: The USD/KRW exchange rate has fallen to the 1,464 won range. As of January 22nd, it was 1,464.36 won, up 1.4% from 1,443 won in early January but down from its monthly high of 1,478 won. Trump's announcement to roll back tariffs is signaling a weakening dollar. Samsung's perspective: The weakening (slowing) exchange rate indicates a slowing in the pace of increase in imported raw material costs. However, volatility is likely until the FOMC decision at the end of January (4:00 a.m. on January 29th). For partner companies, focusing on HRC (steel) and copper is crucial. Actions: ① Reanalyze exchange rate trends after the FOMC announcement (January 29th). ② Simulate price negotiations with suppliers (exchange rate scenarios of 1,420/1,460/1,500 won). ③ Review opportunities to reduce import costs when exchange rate volatility narrows (Deadline: January 31, 2026). (Priority: Medium, Deadline: January 31, 2026). Reference: Bank of Korea (+1), Reuters (+1).
Tag_en: Exchange rate, USD/KRW, 1,464 won, Weakness, -0.8%, Import price

Title: Fed 금리 1월 동결 확정
Summary: Fed 기준금리는 3.50~3.75% 유지될 거 같아요. 1월 27~28일(현지시각) FOMC 회의에서 금리 동결 확률이 95~95.6%예요. 이유는 CPI가 2.7%(1월 13일 발표)로 여전히 2% 목표보다 높고, 고용 시장도 복합적이어서 연준이 신중하기 때문이에요. 삼성 관점: 금리 동결 → 달러 강세 신호 약화 → 원화 약세 압박 완화 좋아요. 하지만 파월 의장의 1월 29일 기자회견 톤(앞으로 금리 인하 계획)이 중요해요. 시장은 3월 인하 전망(45.6%)을 반영하고 있어서 향후 달러 약세 가능성 있어요. 액션: ① FOMC 발표 직후(1월 29일 새벽) 파월 톤 분석 ② 3월/6월 금리 인하 전망에 따른 달러/환율 시나리오 재구성 ③ 수입 원자재 가격 인상 여부 협력사와 선제 협상(기한 2026-02-15) (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-02-15). 참고: Fed공식발표+1, Bloomberg+1
Title_en: Fed confirms interest rate freeze in January
Summary_en: The Fed's benchmark interest rate is likely to remain at 3.50-3.75%. The probability of a rate freeze at the FOMC meeting on January 27-28 (local time) is 95-95.6%. This is because the CPI is still above the 2% target at 2.7% (announced on January 13th), and the job market is complex, so the Fed is being cautious. Samsung's perspective: Rate freeze → weakening dollar strength signals → easing pressure on the won. However, the tone of Chairman Powell's press conference on January 29th (future rate cut plans) is crucial. The market is pricing in a 45.6% expectation of a March cut, so there's a chance the dollar will weaken going forward. Actions: ① Powell's tone analysis immediately following the FOMC announcement (early morning, January 29th); ② Reconstruct the dollar/exchange rate scenario based on the expected March/June rate cuts; ③ Preemptive negotiations with partners regarding a possible increase in imported raw material prices (deadline: February 15, 2026) (Priority: High; Deadline: February 15, 2026). References: Fed official announcement +1, Bloomberg +1
Tag_en: Fed, interest rates, 3.75%, freezing, neutrality, monetary policy

Title: 미국 관세 불확실성 약화
Summary: 트럼프 대통령이 그린란드 협상 진전을 이유로 2월 1일 예정 관세 부과를 연기했어요(1월 21일 발표). 하지만 6월부터는 현재 10%에서 25%로 인상 예정이고, 대중국 관세는 2026년 3월에 28.2%까지 올라갈 것 같아요. 삼성 관점: 단기(~2월) 관세 부담 완화 신호지만 중기(6월) 관세 인상 우려는 지속돼요. 더 우려스러운 건 대중국 관세 급증으로 글로벌 공급망 불안정화 가능성이어요. SEHA 원가는 한·미 관세 인하(25%→15%)로 다소 완화(+1.5~2% → +0.9~1.2% 예상)되지만, 소재(HRC, 구리) 수입 관세 재검토 가능성은 주시 필요해요. 액션: ① 미국관세청 추가 관세 대상 목록 모니터링(주 2회) ② 협력사 가격 협상 일정 재조정(2월 중순으로 연기) ③ 6월 관세 인상 시나리오 별 BOM 재계산 + 경쟁사 대응 벤치마킹(기한 2026-02-28) (우선순위: 중, 기한: 2026-02-28). 참고: 미국관세청+1, Bloomberg+2, 한국자동차공업협회+1
Title_en: Easing uncertainty about US tariffs
Summary_en: President Trump postponed the tariffs scheduled for February 1st (announced on January 21st), citing progress in the Greenland negotiations. However, they are scheduled to increase from the current 10% to 25% starting in June, and the tariffs on China are expected to reach 28.2% by March 2026. Samsung's perspective: While this signals a short-term (~February) easing of the tariff burden, concerns persist about a mid-term (June) tariff increase. A more concerning concern is the potential for global supply chain instability due to the surge in tariffs on China. While the cost of SEHA is expected to ease somewhat (+1.5-2% → +0.9-1.2%) due to the Korea-US tariff cut (25% → 15%), the possibility of a review of import tariffs on materials (HRC, copper) is a matter of concern. Actions: ① Monitor the list of additional tariff targets from the US Customs Service (twice a week); ② Reschedule price negotiations with suppliers (postponed to mid-February); ③ Recalculate BOMs based on June tariff increase scenarios and benchmark competitor responses (deadline: February 28, 2026) (Priority: Medium; Deadline: February 28, 2026). References: US Customs Service (+1), Bloomberg (+2), Korea Automobile Manufacturers Association (KAMA) (+1).
Tag_en: USA, tariff, February postponement, June 25%, China 28%, Normally

Title: HRC 약보합(-0.3%)
Summary: 어제 미 중서부 HRC 선물이 톤당 약 940.08달러로 전일比-0.3%, 1개월比-0.1%, 전년동기比+29.5% 수준이라 여전히 높은 레벨 유지 중이에요.tradingeconomics​ 중국 상하이 HRC 선물은 3,305위안/톤(약 472달러)으로 일간 +0.52% 소폭 강세, 유럽 내수 HRC는 620~630유로/톤 박스권에서 CBAM·세이프가드 불확실성 때문에 상단을 두드리는 분위기라 SEPM·SEDAM 쪽 판재 코스트 부담이 이어지고 있어요.steelorbis+1 삼성 관점에서 광주·SEHA·SEHC 기준 완제품 원가에서 HRC 비중을 12~15%로 보고, HRC -0.3% × 원가 비중 15% × 환율 1,467원/USD 기준으로 보면 하루 단위 BOM 영향은 약 -0.05% 수준으로 미미하지만, 전년동기 대비 +30% 근처라 2026년 단가 레벨 자체는 여전히 부담이라 협력사 인상 요구 명분은 약해지고 기존 고단가 유지·할인 요구 명분은 충분한 상태라고 보면 좋겠어요.tradingeconomics+1 액션: ① 2025년 평균 HRC 단가 대비 2026년 1Q HRC 선물·스팟 레벨 비교해서 판재 계열 BOM 재계산(전년 대비 +20~25% 유지 시, 인상 요구 수용 폭 최대 +1%로 가이드) ② SEHA·SEDAM 주요 강판 협력사와 분기 단가 재협상 시 ‘전년동기 대비 +30% 레벨 유지’ 근거로 추가 인상 방어 및 최소 1~2% 리베이트 요구 ③ CBAM 관련 EU산·중국산 HRC 조달 믹스 점검해 SEPM에는 EU 내수 비중 확대, SEHC·SEDAM에는 중국·베트남산 저가 물량 확대 시나리오 준비 (우선순위: 중, 기한: 2026-01-27). 참고: TradingEconomics+1, SteelOrbis+1, EUROMETAL+1tradingeconomics+2
Title_en: HRC slightly consolidating (-0.3%)
Summary_en: Yesterday, the US Midwest HRC futures were still at a high level at about $940.08 per ton, down -0.3% from the previous day, down -0.1% from one month ago, and up 29.5% from the same period last year. tradingeconomics​ Shanghai HRC futures in China rose slightly by +0.52% daily to 3,305 yuan/ton (about $472), and European domestic HRC is hitting the upper end of the 620-630 euro/ton range due to uncertainty over CBAM and safeguards, so the burden of plate cost on SEPM and SEDAM continues. steelorbis+1 From Samsung's perspective, the proportion of HRC in the finished product cost based on Gwangju, SEHA, and SEHC is 12-15%, and based on HRC -0.3% × cost proportion 15% × exchange rate of 1,467 won/USD, the daily BOM impact is about -0.05%. Although it is insignificant, since it is around +30% compared to the same period last year, the unit price level in 2026 itself is still a burden, so the justification for demanding an increase from partners is weakened, and it is good to see that the justification for maintaining the existing high unit price or demanding a discount is sufficient. tradingeconomics+1 Actions: ① Recalculate the BOM of the plate series by comparing the 2026 1Q HRC futures and spot levels to the average HRC unit price in 2025 (if maintaining +20~25% compared to the previous year, guide the increase request to a maximum of +1%) ② When renegotiating the quarterly unit price with major steel plate partners of SEHA and SEDAM, defend against additional increases based on ‘maintaining the level +30% compared to the same period last year’ and demand at least 1~2% rebate ③ Check the procurement mix of EU and Chinese HRC for CBAM and prepare a scenario to increase the proportion of EU domestic demand for SEPM and expand low-priced Chinese and Vietnamese products for SEHC and SEDAM (Priority: Medium, Deadline: 2026-01-27). Reference: TradingEconomics+1, SteelOrbis+1, EUROMETAL+1tradingeconomics+2
Tag_en: steel, HRC, Price consolidation, -0.3%, CBAM, LME, Nego

Title: 구리 급등(+2.8%)
Summary: 구리가 다시 튀어 올랐어요. 어제 기준 COMEX/CFD 구리가 파운드당 5.94달러로 전일比+2.84%, 1개월比+7.9%, 전년동기比+38.8%까지 오른 상황이라 전고점(6.1달러)에 근접한 고점 구간이에요.tradingeconomics​ LME 3개월물도 1만3천달러대에서 거래되며 재고 타이트·단기 공급 부족 이슈가 이어지고 있고, 1월 중순 이후 랠리 구간에서 현·선물 스프레드가 크게 벌어졌다가 최근에는 컨탱고로 돌아서는 등 변동성이 매우 커진 상태라 SEHA·TSE 구리 사용 제품(세탁기, 에어컨 콘덴서·모터·배관) 원가 압력이 바로 들어오고 있어요.metal+2 삼성 관점에서는 SEHA·TSE 기준 완제품에서 구리 비중을 6~8%로 보면, 구리 +2.84% × 원가 비중 7% × 환율 1,467원 기준으로 BOM에 약 +0.2%p 정도의 상방 압력이 생겨서, 단가 인상 요구에는 보수적으로 응하되 단기 급등 구간에서는 가급적 스팟보다는 장기계약·헤징 비중을 늘려서 평균 매입단가를 분산하는 전략이 유리해 보여요.metal+2 액션: ① SEHA·TSE 기준 2026년 1Q~2Q 구리 사용량 재점검 후, 2개월분은 고정단가(또는 콜옵션 구조)로, 나머지는 분할 매입하는 헤징 전략 수립 ② 주요 구리 협력사(튜브·와이어)와는 ‘1개월 내 추가 +3% 이상 급등 시 조정, -3% 이상 하락 시 인하 재협의’ 조건을 반영한 슬라이딩 조항 포함 재계약 추진 ③ 에어컨·세탁기 구리 사용량을 줄일 수 있는 알루미늄 튜브·모터 경량화 설계 과제 목록화해서 2026년 개발 로드맵에 반영 (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-01-26). 참고: TradingEconomics+1, Metal.com+1, Reuters/Bloomberg+2metal+3
Title_en: Copper surges (+2.8%)
Summary_en: The copper bounced back. As of yesterday, COMEX/CFD copper is at $5.94 per pound, up 2.84% from the previous day, 7.9% from one month ago, and 38.8% from the same period last year, so it is at a high point close to the previous high of $6.10. tradingeconomics​ LME 3-month contracts are also being traded in the $13,000 range, and the issue of tight inventory and short-term supply shortages continues. In addition, the spot/futures spread has widened significantly during the rally since mid-January, but has recently returned to contango, so volatility has greatly increased, putting pressure on the cost of SEHA·TSE copper-using products (washing machines, air conditioner condensers, motors, and pipes). metal+2 From Samsung's perspective, if the copper proportion in finished products based on SEHA·TSE is 6-8%, then copper +2.84% x cost proportion 7% x exchange rate 1,467 won is about +0.2%p to BOM. With upward pressure, it seems advantageous to respond conservatively to unit price increases, but to increase the proportion of long-term contracts and hedging rather than spot purchases during short-term surges to spread out the average purchase price. metal+2 Actions: ① Re-evaluate copper usage in Q1~Q2 2026 based on SEHA·TSE, and establish a hedging strategy to purchase two months' worth at a fixed price (or with a call option structure) and the remainder in installments. ② Promote contract renewals with major copper partners (tubes and wires) that include a sliding clause that reflects the conditions of "adjustment if an additional +3% or more surge occurs within one month, and renegotiation for a reduction if a -3% or more decline occurs." ③ List tasks for lightweight aluminum tubes and motors that can reduce copper usage in air conditioners and washing machines and reflect them in the 2026 development roadmap (Priority: High, Deadline: 2026-01-26). References: TradingEconomics+1, Metal.com+1, Reuters/Bloomberg+2metal+3
Tag_en: copper, Copper, Price surge, +2.8%, LME, COMEX, electric vehicles

Title: 알루미늄 +1.1%
Summary: 어제 LME 알루미늄 3개월물 기준으로 3,173.5달러/톤, 전일比+1.13%로 다시 위로 붙었고, 현물(Cash)은 약 3,093.5달러/톤으로 직전일 대비 -0.7% 수준이라 만기 구조에 따라 혼조지만 전체적으로는 3,100달러대 고점 박스권이에요.metal+2 최근 몇 주간 3,100~3,200달러/톤 레인지에서 등락하면서 2025년 말 대비 1~2% 높은 수준을 유지하는 가운데, 중국·호주 광산·제련소 감산과 에너지 비용, 일부 로지스틱 병목이 겹치면서 상방 리스크가 여전히 열려 있다는 평가가 많아요.balajialuminium+1 삼성 관점에서 SEDAM 냉장고·세탁기 외관·내부 판재, SCGE 알루미늄 부품(케이스, 히트싱크 등) 기준 완제품 원가에서 알루미늄 비중을 4~5%로 보면 알루미늄 +1.1% × 원가 비중 5% × 환율 1,467원 기준으로 BOM에는 약 +0.06%p 정도의 상방만 생긴 수준이라 단기 인상 요구는 제한적으로 수용하되, 3,200달러 이상 올라설 경우에는 헤징·대체소재 검토를 서둘러야 할 타이밍이에요.metal+2 액션: ① SEDAM·SCGE 기준 알루미늄 적용 부품 리스트업 후, 2026년 1Q 기준 톤당 3,200달러(현 레벨 +2% 내외)까지는 기존 단가 유지, 그 이상 구간부터만 탄력 조정하는 내부 가이드 마련 ② 알루미늄 압출·코일 협력사와는 ‘LME 3M 3,000~3,300달러 구간’ 구간별 할인율 테이블을 미리 합의해 향후 랠리 구간에서도 마진을 보호할 수 있도록 계약 구조 재설계 ③ 냉장고 도어·캐비닛 등은 알루미늄 비중을 줄이고 고강도 도장강판(PCM)·플라스틱 복합재로 전환 가능한 품목을 발굴해서 2026~2027년 점진 전환 로드맵 수립 (우선순위: 중, 기한: 2026-02-05). 참고: Metal.com+1, Westmetall+1, Investing.com+1metal+3
Title_en: Aluminum +1.1%
Summary_en: Yesterday, based on the LME 3-month aluminum, it rose again at $3,173.5/ton, +1.13% from the previous day, and the spot (cash) is about $3,093.5/ton, -0.7% from the previous day, so although it is mixed depending on the maturity structure, it is overall in the high range of $3,100. metal+2 In recent weeks, it has fluctuated in the range of $3,100 to $3,200/ton, maintaining a level 1 to 2% higher than the end of 2025, and many are assessing that upside risks are still open due to the overlap of production cuts in mines and smelters in China and Australia, energy costs, and some logistics bottlenecks. balajialuminium+1 From Samsung's perspective, if the proportion of aluminum in the finished product cost based on the exterior and interior panels of SEDAM refrigerators and washing machines, and SCGE aluminum parts (cases, heat sinks, etc.) is 4 to 5%, then aluminum +1.1% × cost proportion 5% × Based on the exchange rate of 1,467 won, the BOM has only seen an upward movement of about +0.06%p, so short-term increase requests should be accepted with a limited degree, but if it rises above $3,200, it is time to expedite the review of hedging and alternative materials. metal+2 Action: ① After listing aluminum-applied parts based on SEDAM·SCGE, maintain the existing unit price up to $3,200 per ton (current level +2% or so) in Q1 2026, and establish an internal guideline to flexibly adjust only the range above that ② Redesign the contract structure to protect margins even in the future rally range by agreeing in advance on a discount rate table for each range of the ‘LME 3M $3,000-$3,300 range’ with aluminum extrusion and coil partners ③ Reduce the proportion of aluminum in refrigerator doors and cabinets, etc., and identify items that can be converted to high-strength painted steel sheets (PCM) and plastic composites, and establish a gradual conversion roadmap for 2026-2027 (Priority: Medium, Deadline: 2026-02-05). Reference: Metal.com+1, Westmetall+1, Investing.com+1metal+3
Tag_en: aluminum, Al, Price increase, +1.1%, LME, SEDAM, refrigerator

Title: R32/R454B 타이트
Summary: 2025년 말부터 2026년 초까지 R32/R454B 전환이 본격화되면서 R454B 가격이 파운드당 17~20달러 수준(20lb 실린더 약 345달러)까지 올라와 있고, 일부 미국 유통 기준으로는 2021년 대비 약 300% 인상된 수준이라는 보고가 있어요.aristotleair​ 여기에 Honeywell이 R454B에 대해 순차적으로 15%→8% 인상 후 추가로 +4달러/파운드 인상과 42% 서차지를 부과하는 등achrnews+1 A2L 냉매 쪽은 구조적인 공급 부족·관세·쿼터 영향으로 2025~26년 사이 누적 20% 이상 추가 인상 압력이 걸려 있는 상황이라, 광주·SEHC·TSE 에어컨·냉장고 냉매 코스트에는 상방 리스크가 상당히 큰 상태예요.frioflor+1 삼성 관점에서 에어컨 기준 냉매 비중을 BOM의 약 2~2.5%로 보고, 단가 +20% 시나리오를 적용하면 냉매 +20% × 원가 비중 2.5% × 환율 1,467원 기준으로 BOM에는 약 +0.5%p 정도의 상방이 생기는 셈이라, 향후 성수기(7~8월) 전까지는 선매입·장기계약·대체냉매 모델 비중 조정이 핵심 과제가 될 것 같아요.frioflor+5 액션: ① 광주·SEHC·TSE 기준 2026년 성수기(7~9월) 예상 생산량 기준으로 R32/R454B 3~4개월분을 선계약(고정단가 또는 상한가 옵션 포함)하고, 이후 물량은 시장 가격에 연동시키는 2트랙 조달 전략 수립 ② 주요 냉매 협력사와는 Honeywell 42% 서차지, 2025~26년 쿼터제 강화 자료를 근거로 ‘연간 인상 상한 +10~15%’ 수준으로 캡을 설정한 장기계약(2~3년)을 제안 ③ 중장기적으로는 R290 등 자연냉매 적용 가능 모델 확대, 냉매 충전량 절감 설계(소형화·마이크로채널 열교환기) 프로젝트를 개발·구매 공동 과제로 정의 (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-02-10). 참고: FRIOFLOR+1, ACHR News+1, FacilitiesDive+1, AristotleAir+1, EnviroControlSystems+1frioflor+4
Title_en: R32/R454B tight
Summary_en: From late 2025 to early 2026, as the transition to R32/R454B begins in earnest, the price of R454B has risen to $17-$20 per pound (about $345 for a 20lb cylinder), and some US distributors report that it has increased by about 300% compared to 2021. aristotleair​ In addition, Honeywell has sequentially increased the price of R454B from 15% to 8%, and is imposing an additional $4/pound increase and a 42% surcharge. acrnews+1 The A2L refrigerant side is facing a cumulative additional increase of more than 20% between 2025 and 2026 due to structural supply shortages, tariffs, and quotas, so there is a significant upward risk in the cost of refrigerants for air conditioners, refrigerators, and Gwangju, SEHC, and TSE. frioflor+1 From Samsung's perspective, the proportion of refrigerants for air conditioners is estimated to be about 2-2.5% of the BOM, and the unit price If the +20% scenario is applied, the BOM will see an upward movement of about +0.5%p based on the refrigerant +20% × cost ratio 2.5% × exchange rate of 1,467 won. Therefore, it seems that adjusting the proportion of pre-purchases, long-term contracts, and alternative refrigerant models will be key tasks until the peak season (July-August). frioflor+5 Action: ① Establish a two-track procurement strategy to pre-contract (including fixed price or upper price option) 3-4 months worth of R32/R454B based on the expected production volume for the peak season (July-September) in 2026 based on Gwangju, SEHC, and TSE, and link subsequent volumes to market prices. ② Propose a long-term contract (2-3 years) with major refrigerant partners with a 42% surcharge from Honeywell and a cap set at the level of ‘annual increase upper limit +10-15%’ based on data on the strengthened quota system in 2025-26. ③ Possibility of application of natural refrigerants such as R290 in the mid- to long-term. The project to expand the model and reduce refrigerant charge (miniaturized, microchannel heat exchanger) was defined as a joint development and procurement project (Priority: High, Deadline: February 10, 2026). References: FRIOFLOR+1, ACHR News+1, FacilitiesDive+1, AristotleAir+1, EnviroControlSystems+1, frioflor+4

Title: PP/PE 방향전환
Summary: 어제 기준 중국 PP 지표가 6,548위안/톤으로 전일比+1.21%, 1개월比+6.8% 반등했지만 전년동기比로는 -10.4% 낮은 수준이라, 단기 반등에도 불구하고 아직은 내려온 레벨을 유지 중이에요.tradingeconomics​ PE도 1월 22일 기준 6,615위안/톤, 전일比+1.33%, 1개월比+6.0%, 전년比-15.1% 수준으로, 2025년 하반기부터 이어진 공급과잉·수요 부진 영향으로 2024~25년 동안 누적 하락 후 최근에야 약간 기술적 반등이 나오는 구간이라는 평가가 많아요.tradingeconomics​ 1월 21일자 업계 리포트도 PE·PP, PS, PVC 등 범용 수지 대부분이 2025년 말까지 하락·보합 기조였고, 2026년 1Q 초반에는 공급과잉·낮은 피드스톡 가격 영향으로 ‘대체로 약보합~보합’ 전망을 유지하고 있어서, 광주·SEPM·SCGE 플라스틱 부품(내·외장재, 포장재)에 대해서는 원가 절감·단가 인하 협상 타이밍으로 보는 게 맞아 보여요.ptonline+1 삼성 관점에서 냉장고·세탁기 플라스틱 부품 기준 레진 비중을 BOM의 8~10%로 보고, PP 지표 전년동기比 -10.4% × 원가 비중 9% × 환율 1,467원 기준으로 보면 잠재적으로 완제품 BOM을 -0.9%p 안팎까지 낮출 수 있는 여지가 있어서, 2026년 1Q~2Q 네고에서 최소 -2~3% 단가 인하는 적극적으로 요구해볼 만한 국면이에요.ptonline+4 액션: ① 광주·SEPM·SCGE 기준 주요 PE/PP 부품(사출·압출)별로 2024년 평균 단가 vs 2026년 1월 CNY 지표 변동률을 매핑해, 협력사별 목표 인하율(-2~3%)을 정량화 ② 중국·동남아 저가 레진 소싱 채널을 추가로 확보해 ‘중국산 레진 기준지표’를 협상 레퍼런스로 활용하고, 기존 국내·EU 공급사에는 최소 1~2% 추가 인하 또는 리베이트 요구 ③ 2026 Q1 BOM을 전년 대비 최소 -0.3~0.5%p 낮추는 것을 목표로 제품·부품 단위 원가 리뷰(두께 최적화, 재질 전환 등)를 진행 (우선순위: 중, 기한: 2026-02-15). 참고: TradingEconomics+2, PlasticsTechnology+2ptonline+3
Title_en: PP/PE direction change
Summary_en: As of yesterday, the Chinese PP index rebounded to 6,548 yuan/ton, up 1.21% from the previous day and up 6.8% from a month ago, but it is still at a level of -10.4% lower than the same period last year, so it is still maintaining a lower level despite the short-term rebound. tradingeconomics​ PE was also at 6,615 yuan/ton, up 1.33% from the previous day, up 6.0% from a month ago, and down 15.1% from a year ago as of January 22. Many people evaluate that this is a period in which a slight technical rebound has only recently occurred after an accumulated decline from 2024 to 2025 due to the effects of oversupply and sluggish demand that continued from the second half of 2025. tradingeconomics​ According to an industry report dated January 21, most general-purpose resins such as PE, PP, PS, and PVC were on a downward or sideways trend until the end of 2025, and in the early 1Q of 2026, Due to the impact of oversupply and low feedstock prices, the outlook for 'generally weak to stable' is maintained, so it seems right to see this as the timing for cost reduction and unit price reduction negotiations for Gwangju, SEPM, and SCGE plastic parts (interior and exterior materials, packaging materials). ptonline+1 From Samsung's perspective, considering the resin proportion of refrigerator and washing machine plastic parts to be 8-10% of the BOM, and based on the PP index -10.4% year-on-year × cost proportion 9% × exchange rate of 1,467 won, there is room to potentially reduce the finished product BOM by around -0.9%p, so it is worth actively requesting at least a -2-3% unit price reduction in the 1Q-2Q negotiations in 2026. ptonline+4 Action: ① Based on Gwangju, SEPM, and SCGE, map the average unit price in 2024 vs. the CNY index change rate in January 2026 for each major PE/PP part (injection and extrusion), and set targets for each partner. ② Quantify the reduction rate (-2-3%). ② Secure additional low-cost resin sourcing channels in China and Southeast Asia, utilize the "Chinese resin benchmark" as a negotiation reference, and demand at least an additional 1-2% reduction or rebate from existing domestic and EU suppliers. ③ Conduct a product/component unit cost review (thickness optimization, material conversion, etc.) with the goal of reducing the 2026 Q1 BOM by at least -0.3-0.5%p year-on-year. (Priority: Medium, Deadline: 2026-02-15) Reference: TradingEconomics+2, PlasticsTechnology+2ptonline+3
Tag_en: resin, PP, PE, Price fluctuations, -10.4%, oversupply, Nego

Title_en: HRC remains weak, tariffs remain at 50%
Summary_en: Yesterday, HRC fluctuated slightly at the beginning of the month at $942/T. With the US 50% tariff remaining in place through 2026, the price remains strong. While the cost burden on SEHA (North America) is small, the likelihood of tariff removal is decreasing in the long term. Samsung's perspective: It's time to restructure the raw material costs of washing machines and refrigerators at its North American subsidiary. Actions: ① Monitor HRC futures spot prices (weekly +/- 1%). ② Negotiate contract renewals with SEHA suppliers (deadline: February 7, 2026). ③ Review alternative materials (aluminum, plastic) (Priority: Medium, Deadline: February 14, 2026). References: TradingEconomics+2, Steel Information Center+1

Title_en: Copper supply shortage deepens, prices rise
Summary_en: COMEX copper fell to $5.74/Lbs yesterday (-0.60% daily), but is still rising at a high of +7.94% monthly. Due to ongoing supply constraints stemming from mine disruptions in Chile and Congo, BofA has revised its 2026 forecast upward to $11,313/ton. SEHA and TSE copper demand sources (condenser components) are likely to see higher costs. Samsung's perspective: Restructuring of copper purchase budgets for Southeast Asian and North American subsidiaries is necessary. Actions include: ① Diversifying copper suppliers (securing alternative sources from Brazil and Peru), ② hedging TSE/SEHA monthly purchases (covering 80% of COMEX futures, due February 7, 2026), and ③ negotiating unit prices with capacitor suppliers (upper limit +2%, due February 14, 2026). (Priority: High, due January 31, 2026). References: BofA+1, Morgan Stanley+1, TradeService+1
Tag_en: copper, COMEX, Shortage of supply, +7.94%, mine disruption

Title_en: Aluminum supply shortages are driving prices higher.
Summary_en: Yesterday, LME aluminum prices rose steadily to $3,175/ton (daily +1.10%). The price continues to strengthen, with a monthly +7.39% and a yearly +20.42% gain. Supply is tight due to the Australian mine strike and Chinese export restrictions. SEDAM (Mexico) refrigerator prices (aluminum content: 3.2%) are expected to rise. Samsung's perspective: Price increase requests from SEDAM suppliers are expected → Negotiation preparations are essential. Actions: ① Monitor the continuation of the Australian strike (daily supply shortage), ② Review hedging of SEDAM aluminum futures (LME +5% scenario for the next three months), and ③ Discuss development of alternative materials (recycled aluminum, composite materials) with suppliers (deadline: February 21, 2026). (Priority: Medium, Deadline: February 7, 2026). References: LME+1, Worthwill+1, TradeEconomics+1
Tag_en: aluminum, Shortage of supply, +7.39%, Australian strike

Title: 냉매 규제 강화, 가격 급등 임박
Summary: 중국 HFC 금지(2026.01.01 시행) + EU F-gas 규제 강화로 냉매 공급 타이트해졌어요. R454B·R32 전환 가속화되면서 기존 냉매 가격 +18~20% 상승 예상. 광주사업장·SEHC 에어컨 냉매 비용 대폭 증가 임박. 삼성 관점: 냉매 공급사 가격 인상 협상 피하기 어렵고, 장기계약 체결 시급. 액션: ① 냉매 공급사 R454B 확보 전략 수립(2026년 Q1 납입량 고정, 기한 2026-02-07) ② 광주·호치민 냉매 공급 장기계약 갱신(GWP 규제 크리프 +20% 선반영, 기한 2026-02-14) ③ R290·R32 호환 모델 개발 가속(2026 신모델 적용 검토, 기한 2026-02-21) (우선순위: 상, 기한 2026-02-07). 참고: 생태환경부+1, EU공식+1, 냉동공조협회+1
Title_en: Refrigerant regulations tighten, prices surge imminent
Summary_en: Refrigerant supply is tightening due to the Chinese HFC ban (effective January 1, 2026) and the strengthening of EU F-gas regulations. As the transition to R454B and R32 accelerates, prices of existing refrigerants are expected to rise by 18-20%. A significant increase in refrigerant costs for air conditioners at the Gwangju plant and SEHC is imminent. Samsung's perspective: It is difficult to avoid price increase negotiations with refrigerant suppliers, and long-term contracts must be signed as soon as possible. Actions: ① Establish a strategy to secure R454B from refrigerant suppliers (fixed delivery volume for Q1 2026, due February 7, 2026); ② Renew long-term refrigerant supply contracts in Gwangju and Ho Chi Minh City (pre-refrigerant for GWP regulation creep +20%, due February 14, 2026); ③ Accelerate development of R290 and R32 compatible models (review for application to new models in 2026, due February 21, 2026) (Priority: High, due February 7, 2026). Reference: Ministry of Environment +1, EU Official +1, Refrigeration and Air-Conditioning Association +1
Tag_en: refrigerant, R454B, R32, Strengthening regulations, GWP, +20%

Title: 레진 공급과잉, 가격 약세 지속
Summary: 어제 PP 6,580 CNY/T (일일 소폭 변동)로 공급 과잉 여파 이어지고 있어요. 중국 석유화학 생산 증가로 PE/PP 여유 있어서 협력사 가격 인하 기회가 확대됐어요. 광주·SEPM(유럽) 냉장고 플라스틱 부품(PP 비중 높음) 원가 절감 적기. 삼성 관점: 레진 협력사 가격 네고 황금기 → 분기 BOM 개선 가능. 액션: ① 협력사 PE/PP 가격 인하 협상 목표 -2~3% (기한 2026-02-14) ② SCGE(소주) 공급사 계약갱신 추진(공급 안정성+가격 인하 조건, 기한 2026-02-28) ③ 2026 Q1 BOM 하향 편성(예상 절감액 +0.3% margin 반영, 기한 2026-01-31) (우선순위: 중, 기한 2026-01-31). 참고: CESCO+1, PPI+1, SunSirs+1
Title_en: Resin oversupply continues, prices remain weak
Summary_en: Yesterday, PP priced at CNY 6,580/T (slight daily fluctuation), continuing the effects of oversupply. Due to increased Chinese petrochemical production, there is room for PE/PP, expanding opportunities for partner price reductions. Gwangju and SEPM (Europe) are in a prime position to reduce costs for refrigerator plastic parts (high proportion of PP). Samsung's perspective: This is a golden age for resin supplier price negotiations → Quarterly BOM improvement is possible. Actions: ① Negotiation target for PE/PP price reductions with partners -2-3% (deadline: February 14, 2026); ② Renewal of SCGE (Suzhou) supplier contract (conditions for supply stability + price reduction, due February 28, 2026); ③ Downgrade of Q1 2026 BOM (reflecting expected savings +0.3% margin, due January 31, 2026) (Priority: Medium, due January 31, 2026). References: CESCO+1, PPI+1, SunSirs+1
Tag_en: resin, PP, PE, oversupply, -0.5%, Negotiation opportunity

Supply is tight due to the Australian mine strike and Chinese export restrictions. SEDAM (Mexico) refrigerator prices (aluminum content: 3.2%) are expected to rise. Samsung's perspective: Price increase requests from SEDAM suppliers are expected → Negotiation preparations are essential. Actions: ① Monitor the continuation of the Australian strike (daily supply shortage), ② Review hedging of SEDAM aluminum futures (LME +5% scenario for the next three months), and ③ Discuss development of alternative materials (recycled aluminum, composite materials) with suppliers (deadline: February 21, 2026). (Priority: Medium, Deadline: February 7, 2026). References: LME+1, Worthwill+1, TradeEconomics+1
Tag_en: aluminum, Shortage of supply, +7.39%, Australian strike

Title: 냉매 규제 강화, 가격 급등 임박
Summary: 중국 HFC 금지(2026.01.01 시행) + EU F-gas 규제 강화로 냉매 공급 타이트해졌어요. R454B·R32 전환 가속화되면서 기존 냉매 가격 +18~20% 상승 예상. 광주사업장·SEHC 에어컨 냉매 비용 대폭 증가 임박. 삼성 관점: 냉매 공급사 가격 인상 협상 피하기 어렵고, 장기계약 체결 시급. 액션: ① 냉매 공급사 R454B 확보 전략 수립(2026년 Q1 납입량 고정, 기한 2026-02-07) ② 광주·호치민 냉매 공급 장기계약 갱신(GWP 규제 크리프 +20% 선반영, 기한 2026-02-14) ③ R290·R32 호환 모델 개발 가속(2026 신모델 적용 검토, 기한 2026-02-21) (우선순위: 상, 기한 2026-02-07). 참고: 생태환경부+1, EU공식+1, 냉동공조협회+1
Title_en: Refrigerant regulations tighten, prices surge imminent
Summary_en: Refrigerant supply is tightening due to the Chinese HFC ban (effective January 1, 2026) and the strengthening of EU F-gas regulations. As the transition to R454B and R32 accelerates, prices of existing refrigerants are expected to rise by 18-20%. A significant increase in refrigerant costs for air conditioners at the Gwangju plant and SEHC is imminent. Samsung's perspective: It is difficult to avoid price increase negotiations with refrigerant suppliers, and long-term contracts must be signed as soon as possible. Actions: ① Establish a strategy to secure R454B from refrigerant suppliers (fixed delivery volume for Q1 2026, due February 7, 2026); ② Renew long-term refrigerant supply contracts in Gwangju and Ho Chi Minh City (pre-refrigerant for GWP regulation creep +20%, due February 14, 2026); ③ Accelerate development of R290 and R32 compatible models (review for application to new models in 2026, due February 21, 2026) (Priority: High, due February 7, 2026). Reference: Ministry of Environment +1, EU Official +1, Refrigeration and Air-Conditioning Association +1
Tag_en: refrigerant, R454B, R32, Strengthening regulations, GWP, +20%

Title: 레진 공급과잉, 가격 약세 지속
Summary: 어제 PP 6,580 CNY/T (일일 소폭 변동)로 공급 과잉 여파 이어지고 있어요. 중국 석유화학 생산 증가로 PE/PP 여유 있어서 협력사 가격 인하 기회가 확대됐어요. 광주·SEPM(유럽) 냉장고 플라스틱 부품(PP 비중 높음) 원가 절감 적기. 삼성 관점: 레진 협력사 가격 네고 황금기 → 분기 BOM 개선 가능. 액션: ① 협력사 PE/PP 가격 인하 협상 목표 -2~3% (기한 2026-02-14) ② SCGE(소주) 공급사 계약갱신 추진(공급 안정성+가격 인하 조건, 기한 2026-02-28) ③ 2026 Q1 BOM 하향 편성(예상 절감액 +0.3% margin 반영, 기한 2026-01-31) (우선순위: 중, 기한 2026-01-31). 참고: CESCO+1, PPI+1, SunSirs+1
Title_en: Resin oversupply continues, prices remain weak
Summary_en: Yesterday, PP priced at CNY 6,580/T (slight daily fluctuation), continuing the effects of oversupply. Due to increased Chinese petrochemical production, there is room for PE/PP, expanding opportunities for partner price reductions. Gwangju and SEPM (Europe) are in a prime position to reduce costs for refrigerator plastic parts (high proportion of PP). Samsung's perspective: This is a golden age for resin supplier price negotiations → Quarterly BOM improvement is possible. Actions: ① Negotiation target for PE/PP price reductions with partners -2-3% (deadline: February 14, 2026); ② Renewal of SCGE (Suzhou) supplier contract (conditions for supply stability + price reduction, due February 28, 2026); ③ Downgrade of Q1 2026 BOM (reflecting expected savings +0.3% margin, due January 31, 2026) (Priority: Medium, due January 31, 2026). References: CESCO+1, PPI+1, SunSirs+1
Tag_en: resin, PP, PE, oversupply, -0.5%, Negotiation opportunity

Title: 멕시코 수입관세 인상 단행
Summary: 멕시코 정부가 1월 1일부터 1,400개 이상 상품의 수입관세를 인상했어요. 특히 자유무역협정 미체결국(중국, 인도, 태국 등)의 철강·자동차 부품에 20~50% 관세를 매겼어요. SEDAM 케레타로 공장은 해외에서 수입하는 철강(HRC, 봉강)의 가격 상승 우려 생겼어요. 브라질산 철강 제품도 20~35% 추가 관세 대상이라 공급가 올라갈 전망. 삼성 영향: SEDAM의 원가 부담 +2~4% 상승 예상 (철강 비중 10~15% 기준). 대응: SEDAM은 현재 멕시코 현지 철강사와 공급가 협상 재개 필요. 동시에 다른 지역 공급선(한국, 미국) 확대 검토. 액션: ① SEDAM 현지 담당자에 공급사 영향도 확인 ② 멕시코 철강 협력사별 가격 상승분 협상 (기한 2026-02-01) ③ 한국·미국 공급사 긴급 협상 (기한 2026-02-05) (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-01-24). 참고: 멕시코정부공시+1, Argus Media+2
Title_en: Mexico raises import tariffs
Summary_en: The Mexican government raised import tariffs on over 1,400 products starting January 1st. In particular, tariffs of 20-50% were imposed on steel and auto parts from countries with which it has not signed free trade agreements (such as China, India, and Thailand). SEDAM's Querétaro plant is concerned about rising prices for imported steel (HRC, bar steel). Brazilian steel products are also subject to additional tariffs of 20-35%, which is expected to drive up supply costs. Impact on Samsung: SEDAM's cost burden is expected to increase by 2-4% (based on a 10-15% steel content). Response: SEDAM needs to resume price negotiations with local Mexican steelmakers. Simultaneously, it is considering expanding its supply network to other regions (Korea and the United States). Actions: ① Confirm the impact on suppliers with SEDAM's local representative. ② Negotiate price increases with Mexican steel suppliers (Deadline: February 1, 2026). ③ Urgent negotiations with Korean and U.S. suppliers (Deadline: February 5, 2026). (Priority: High, Deadline: January 24, 2026). Reference: Mexican government announcement +1, Argus Media +2.
Tag_en: Mexico, tariff, steel, +20~50%, SEDAM, Querétaro

Title: 브라질 레알화 강세 지속
Summary: 브라질 레알화(BRL)가 최근 안정적으로 강세를 보이고 있어요. USD/BRL이 1월 23일 기준 5.29 수준으로 지난 1월 초 5.52에서 약 4.15% 강세 전환됐어요. 이건 신흥국 투자 심리 회복과 브라질 중앙은행의 긍정적 신호가 영향 미쳤어요. SEDA 캄피나스 공장 관점: 레알화 강세 → 달러 기준 수입 비용 (냉매, 철강, 포장재) 상대적으로 낮아져서 좋은 뉴스예요. 다만 연 말 외채 상환(약 32.3억 달러)로 다시 약세 가능성 있어요. 대응: SEDA는 현재 유리한 환율 타이밍에 달러 선물 매입 검토 필요. 협력사 가격 협상도 현재 진행 중인 수준 유지 권장. 액션: ① SEDA 재무팀과 환율 헤징 전략 협의 ② 협력사 장기 가격 계약 체결 검토 (기한 2026-02-10) ③ 분기별 환율 시나리오 분석 (기한 2026-02-01) (우선순위: 중, 기한: 2026-01-30). 참고: Trading Economics+1, 중앙은행발표+2
Title_en: The Brazilian real continues to strengthen.
Summary_en: The Brazilian real (BRL) has been steadily strengthening recently. As of January 23, the USD/BRL exchange rate stood at 5.29, up about 4.15% from 5.52 in early January. This was driven by recovering investor sentiment in emerging markets and positive signals from the Brazilian Central Bank. SEDA's Campinas plant's perspective: The strengthening real is positive news, as it reduces the relative cost of imports (refrigerants, steel, packaging materials) in dollar terms. However, there's a possibility of further weakening due to the repayment of foreign debt (approximately $3.23 billion) at the end of the year. SEDA's response: SEDA needs to consider purchasing dollar futures at the current favorable exchange rate. It's also recommended that partner price negotiations remain at the current levels. Actions: ① Discuss exchange rate hedging strategies with SEDA's finance team. ② Review the conclusion of long-term pricing agreements with partners (deadline: February 10, 2026). ③ Analyze quarterly exchange rate scenarios (deadline: February 1, 2026). (Priority: Medium, Deadline: January 30, 2026). References: Trading Economics+1, Central Bank Announcement+2
Tag_en: brazil, Exchange rate, call, stress, Realization, SEDA

Title: 폴란드 전기료 내년 13.5% 인하
Summary: 좋은 소식이 들어왔어요! 폴란드 에너지청(URE)이 2026년 전기요금을 2025년 4분기 대비 13.5% 인하하기로 승인했어요. 가정용 전기료가 평균 PLN 495.16/MWh로 정해졌대요. 그동안 폴란드 전기료가 EU에서 가장 빠르게 올랐는데(올해 상반기 +20% YoY) 이제 안정화되는 신호예요. SEPM 브론키 공장 영향: 산업용 전기료도 함께 인하될 가능성 높아요 → 원가 부담 약 -1~1.5% 경감 예상. 특히 냉장고·세탁기 생산 원가가 개선돼요. 대응 방향: SEPM은 현재 상황 지켜보면서 협력사와 가격 협상에 유리한 위치 점할 수 있어요. 하지만 임금 인상 압력(작년 +3~5%)은 여전해서 종합적으로 평가 필요. 액션: ① URE 최종 산업용 전기요금 확인 (기한 2026-01-24) ② SEPM 월 전력비 재계산 및 BOM 임팩트 평가 ③ 2026년 협력사 가격 협상 전략 수립 (기한 2026-02-05) (우선순위: 중, 기한: 2026-02-01). 참고: 폴란드정부공시+1, PAP+1
Title_en: Poland's electricity prices to be cut by 13.5% next year
Summary_en: Good news! The Polish Energy Agency (URE) has approved a 13.5% reduction in electricity prices for 2026 compared to the fourth quarter of 2025. The average household electricity price has been set at PLN 495.16/MWh. Polish electricity prices, which have been rising the fastest in the EU (+20% year-on-year in the first half of this year), are now showing signs of stabilizing. Impact on the SEPM Wronki plant: Industrial electricity prices are also likely to decline. → Cost burden is expected to decrease by approximately 1-1.5%. Production costs for refrigerators and washing machines in particular will improve. Response: SEPM can monitor the current situation and gain an advantageous position in price negotiations with its suppliers. However, wage pressure (+3-5% from last year) remains, requiring a comprehensive evaluation. Actions: ① Confirmation of URE's final industrial electricity rates (deadline: January 24, 2026); ② Recalculation of SEPM monthly electricity costs and BOM impact assessment; ③ Establishment of a 2026 supplier price negotiation strategy (deadline: February 5, 2026); (Priority: Medium; Deadline: February 1, 2026). Reference: Polish Government Disclosure +1, PAP +1
Tag_en: Poland, Electricity bill, Inha, -13.5%, SEPM, Bronki

Title: 태국 전기료 1월 인하 추진
Summary: 태국 에너지부가 좋은 소식을 전했어요. 2026년 1~4월 전기료를 배럴당 3.88 바트/kWh로 인하할 거래요. 기존 3.94 바트에서 약 1.5% 내려가는 거예요. LNG 가격 하락(배럴당 $12.5→$11.6)이 주 요인. TSE 라차 공장 입장: 전기료 인하 → 원가 부담 약 -0.5~1% 경감 예상. 다만 태국 정치 불안(최근 몇 년 간 쿠데타·정정 반복)과 정부 에너지 정책 변동성이 리스크예요. 대응: TSE는 에너지 인하의 이점을 협력사 가격 협상에 활용할 기회. 동시에 태국 정치·경제 동향 모니터링 강화 필수. 액션: ① TSE 현지 담당자에 전력비 인하 확정 시기 확인 ② 라차 공장 원가 절감 시나리오 분석 ③ 정치 리스크 헤징 및 공급선 분산 재검토 (기한 2026-02-10) (우선순위: 중, 기한: 2026-02-01). 참고: 태국에너지부발표+1, Argus Media+1
Title_en: Thailand pushes to lower electricity rates in January
Summary_en: Thailand's Ministry of Energy has delivered good news: electricity rates will be reduced to 3.88 baht/kWh per barrel from January to April 2026, a reduction of approximately 1.5% from the previous 3.94 baht. This reduction is primarily due to a decline in LNG prices (from $12.5 to $11.6 per barrel). TSE's position on the Racha plant is: The electricity rate reduction is expected to reduce the cost burden by approximately 0.5-1%. However, political instability in Thailand (repeated coups and political upheavals in recent years) and government energy policy volatility pose risks. Response: TSE will leverage the energy rate reduction to negotiate prices with its partners. At the same time, strengthened monitoring of Thai political and economic trends is essential. Actions: 1) Confirm the final timing of the electricity rate reduction with TSE's local representative; 2) Analyze cost reduction scenarios for the Racha plant; and 3) Review political risk hedging and supply diversification (Deadline: February 10, 2026) (Priority: Medium; Deadline: February 1, 2026). Reference: Thailand Ministry of Energy announcement +1, Argus Media +1
Tag_en: thailand, Electricity bill, Inha, -1.5%, TSE, Racha

Title: 이집트 통화 변동성 및 외채 부담
Summary: 이집트 상황이 복잡하네요. 이집트 파운드(EGP)가 지난해 말 약세 우려가 있어요. 올해 인플레이션은 12.3% 수준이지만 외채 상환 부담(32.3억 달러)이 압박. 분석가들은 2026년 말까지 USD/EGP가 49~52 범위로 약세 전망하고 있어요. 지난 4월 역사적 저점(51.72)까지 갔다가 지금은 약 47~49 수준. SEEG 베니수에프 공장 영향: 통화 약세 → 달러 기준 수입 비용 (철강, 냉매, 부품재) 상승 우려. 반면 이집트산 세탁기 수출 경쟁력은 개선. 대응: SEEG는 현재 환율 헤징 계획 서둘러야 해요. 동시에 협력사 가격 협상에 대비해야 해요. 외채 상환 시기가 분산돼 있어서 월별 환율 변동성 모니터링 필요. 액션: ① SEEG 현지 담당자에 이집트 중앙은행 정책 모니터링 강화 ② 2026년 달러 선물 매입 규모 재계산 ③ 협력사 가격 인상 대비 협상 시나리오 (기한 2026-02-05) (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-02-01). 참고: Reuters+1, Daily News Egypt+1, 이집트중앙은행+1
Title_en: Egypt's currency volatility and foreign debt burden
Summary_en: The situation in Egypt is complex. There are concerns about the Egyptian pound (EGP) weakening late last year. Inflation is expected to be around 12.3% this year, but the burden of external debt repayments (USD 3.23 billion) is weighing on the market. Analysts predict the USD/EGP will weaken to a range of 49-52 by the end of 2026. After hitting a historic low of 51.72 in April, it is currently hovering around 47-49. The impact on SEEG's Beni Suef plant: The weakening currency raises concerns about rising dollar-denominated import costs (steel, refrigerants, and parts). On the other hand, the competitiveness of Egyptian washing machine exports is improving. Response: SEEG must expedite its current exchange rate hedging plan. Simultaneously, it must prepare for price negotiations with its partners. Because external debt repayments are spread out, monthly exchange rate volatility must be monitored. Actions: ① Strengthen monitoring of Central Bank of Egypt policy by SEEG local officials, ② Recalculate the 2026 dollar futures purchase volume, and ③ Negotiation scenarios for partner price increases (Deadline: February 5, 2026) (Priority: High, Deadline: February 1, 2026). References: Reuters+1, Daily News Egypt+1, Central Bank of Egypt+1
Tag_en: Egypt, call, Weak, foreign debt, inflation, SEEG

Title: 인도 2월 12일 대규모 총파업 예정
Summary: 인도 상황이 심각해요. 인도 노조 연합(CTU)이 2월 12일 대규모 전국 총파업을 공식 선언했어요. 이건 역대 최대 규모 파업이 될 전망. 이유는 최근 노동법 개편(4대 노동법 시행)에 반발하는 거예요. SIEL-P(첸나이)·SIEL-N(노이다) 공장 영향: 철강·구리·전자부품 공급사들이 파업에 참여하면 공급 차질 2~3주 우려. 냉장고·세탁기·에어컨 생산이 영향 받을 가능성 높아요. 특히 SIEL-P는 인도 철강 공급사에 70% 의존. 대응: 양 공장 모두 긴급으로 비축 증가 검토 필수. 2월 초부터 현지 협력사와 파업 대비 계획 협의 필수. 액션: ① SIEL-P·SIEL-N 현지 담당자에 파업 영향도 및 협력사 가동 상황 확인 (기한 2026-01-24) ② 철강·구리·전자부품 비축 규모 증가 검토 (기한 2026-01-31) ③ 파업 기간 생산 일정 조정 및 고객사 조율 (기한 2026-02-05) (우선순위: 매우높음, 기한: 2026-01-24). 참고: 인도현지언론+2, Economic Times+1
Title_en: A massive general strike is expected in India on February 12.
Summary_en: The situation in India is dire. The Confederation of Trade Unions (CTU) officially declared a nationwide general strike on February 12th. This is expected to be the largest strike in history. The reason is protest against the recent revision of labor laws (implementation of four major labor laws). Impact on SIEL-P (Chennai) and SIEL-N (Noida) factories: If steel, copper, and electronic component suppliers participate in the strike, supply disruptions are expected to last for two to three weeks. Production of refrigerators, washing machines, and air conditioners is likely to be affected. SIEL-P, in particular, relies 70% on Indian steel suppliers. Response: Both factories must urgently review increasing stockpiles. Discussions with local partners about strike preparedness plans are essential starting in early February. Actions: ① Check with local SIEL-P and SIEL-N representatives on the impact of the strike and the operational status of their partners (deadline: January 24, 2026); ② Consider increasing the stockpile of steel, copper, and electronic components (deadline: January 31, 2026); ③ Adjust production schedules and coordinate with customers during the strike (deadline: February 5, 2026); (Priority: Very High; Deadline: January 24, 2026). References: Indian local media +2, Economic Times +1
Tag_en: India, strike, general strike, february, labor, SIEL-P, SIEL-N

Title: 중국 레어어스·텅스텐 수출제한 강화
Summary: 중국이 전략 광물 수출을 더욱 강하게 제한하고 있어요. 2026년부터 실버(은)도 전략 광물 취급으로 지정되면서 수출 쿼터 제한이 시작돼요. 동시에 레어어스·텅스텐·안티몬 수출도 계속 제한되고 있어요. 이건 중국이 2025년 4월부터 시작한 제한 조치를 강화하는 거예요. SCGE 소주 공장 및 글로벌 협력사 영향: 중국산 레어어스 의존 공급사들의 원가 상승 우려 생겼어요. 냉장고·에어컨 제조에 쓰이는 자석·센서 가격이 올라갈 전망. 한국·베트남·태국 협력사도 중국산 원자재 공급 차질 우려. 삼성 전체 영향: 글로벌 레어어스·텅스텐 수급 긴장 → BOM 원가 +1~3% 상승 예상 (지역별 영향도 다름). 대응: SCGE는 글로벌 공급사 다변화 가속화 필수. 한국·미국·베트남 공급사와 장기 계약 협상 착수. 액션: ① SCGE·글로벌 조달팀에 중국 정책 영향도 평가 ② 레어어스·텅스텐 대체 공급원 긴급 발굴 (기한 2026-02-15) ③ 글로벌 BOM 재계산 및 원가 시나리오 분석 (기한 2026-03-01) (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-02-05). 참고: 중국정부공시+1, CNBC+2, CMTradeLaw+1
Title_en: China Strengthens Export Restrictions on Rare Earth and Tungsten
Summary_en: China is tightening restrictions on strategic mineral exports. Silver will also be designated as a strategic mineral starting in 2026, subject to export quotas. At the same time, exports of rare earth, tungsten, and antimony are also being restricted. This strengthens the restrictions China implemented in April 2025. Impact on SCGE's Suzhou plant and global partners: Suppliers dependent on Chinese rare earth are concerned about rising costs. Prices for magnets and sensors used in refrigerator and air conditioner manufacturing are expected to rise. Suppliers in Korea, Vietnam, and Thailand are also concerned about disruptions in the supply of raw materials from China. Overall impact on Samsung: Global supply and demand for rare earth and tungsten is strained, and BOM costs are expected to rise by 1-3% (regional impacts also vary). Response: SCGE must accelerate the diversification of its global suppliers. It has initiated long-term contract negotiations with suppliers in Korea, the United States, and Vietnam. Actions: ① Assess the impact of Chinese policies on SCGE and the global procurement team. ② Urgently identify alternative sources of rare earth and tungsten (deadline: February 15, 2026). ③ Recalculate the global BOM and analyze cost scenarios (deadline: March 1, 2026). (Priority: High, Deadline: February 5, 2026). References: Chinese Government Disclosure +1, CNBC +2, CMTradeLaw +1
Tag_en: china, Rare Earth, export restrictions, strategic minerals, SCGE, tungsten

Title: 한국 전기료 1분기 동결 유지
Summary: 한전이 2026년 1분기(1~3월) 전기료를 그대로 동결하기로 했어요. 국제 유가가 내려갔는데도 정부 지시로 현 수준(기본요금 + 5원/kWh)을 유지하기로. 한전의 재정 건전화 때문이라고. 광주사업장 입장: 좋은 점은 전기료 인상이 없다는 거. 안 좋은 점은 앞으로 인상 압박이 커질 가능성 있다는 거. 삼성 DA 생산 부문 원가 안정화에 도움 되지만, 협력사 전기료 인상분은 계속 올라올 수 있어요. 대응: 광주 공장은 에너지 절감 프로젝트 지속. 협력사 가격 협상에서도 전기료 인상분 모니터링 필수. 액션: ① 한전·정부 에너지 정책 변화 모니터링 ② 협력사 전기료 인상 영향도 추적 ③ 태양광·수소 에너지 도입 프로젝트 진행 상황 점검 (기한 2026-03-01) (우선순위: 중, 기한: 2026-02-01). 참고: 한전공시+1, 조선일보+1
Title_en: South Korea's electricity rates remain frozen in the first quarter.
Summary_en: Korea Electric Power Corporation (KEPCO) has decided to freeze electricity rates for the first quarter of 2026 (January to March). Despite falling international oil prices, the government has directed the rate to remain at the current level (base rate + 5 won/kWh). This is due to KEPCO's financial soundness. The Gwangju plant's position: The positive aspect is that there will be no rate increase. The negative aspect is that pressure for rate increases may increase in the future. While this will help stabilize costs in Samsung's DA production division, electricity rate increases for its partners could continue to rise. Response: The Gwangju plant will continue its energy-saving projects. Monitoring electricity rate increases is essential in price negotiations with partners. Actions: ① Monitor changes in KEPCO and government energy policies, ② Track the impact of electricity rate increases on partners, and ③ Monitor the progress of solar and hydrogen energy adoption projects (Deadline: March 1, 2026) (Priority: Medium, Deadline: February 1, 2026). Reference: KEPCO Public Notice +1, Chosun Ilbo +1
Tag_en: korea, Electricity bill, freezing, KEPCO, gwangju

Title: 미국 철강·알루미늄 고관세 지속
Summary: 트럼프 행정부의 고관세 정책이 계속되고 있어요. 철강·알루미늄 수입품에 41.1% 관세가 매겨져 있고, 중국산은 37.4%, 전체 평균 10.91%까지 올라갔어요. 이건 지난 1월 2.2%에서 5배 이상 증가한 거. SEHA 뉴베리 공장 영향: 미국 내 철강·구리 수입가 계속 높아져 있어요. SEHA가 미국 공급사에서 구매하는 철강·구리는 여전히 고가. 다만 USMCA(미국-멕시코-캐나다협정) 적용받는 멕시코·캐나다산은 관세 우대. 대응: SEHA는 USMCA 원산지 규정 활용한 공급선 활용 지속. 동시에 멕시코 공급사와의 가격 경합 검토. 액션: ① SEHA 현지 담당자에 미국 철강 수입가 모니터링 강화 ② USMCA 원산지 협력사 발굴 및 협상 (기한 2026-02-10) ③ 비용 절감 시나리오 분석 (기한 2026-02-20) (우선순위: 중, 기한: 2026-02-05). 참고: 펜실베이니아 와튼+1, Reuters+1, Argus Media+1
Title_en: US steel and aluminum tariffs continue
Summary_en: The Trump administration's high tariff policy continues. A 41.1% tariff is imposed on steel and aluminum imports, with tariffs on Chinese imports reaching 37.4% and an overall average of 10.91%. This represents a more than fivefold increase from 2.2% in January. Impact on SEHA's Newbury plant: U.S. steel and copper imports continue to rise. SEHA purchases steel and copper from U.S. suppliers at high prices. However, Mexican and Canadian products under the United States-Mexico-Canada Agreement (USMCA) receive preferential tariffs. Response: SEHA will continue to leverage its supply chain, leveraging the USMCA rules of origin. At the same time, it is considering price competition with Mexican suppliers. Actions: ① Strengthen monitoring of U.S. steel import prices by SEHA local representatives; ② Identify and negotiate with USMCA origin partners (deadline: February 10, 2026); ③ Analyze cost-saving scenarios (deadline: February 20, 2026); (Priority: Medium; Deadline: February 5, 2026). References: Wharton, Pennsylvania, +1, Reuters, +1, Argus Media, +1
Tag_en: USA, tariff, steel, aluminum, 41.1%, SEHA

Title: 카자흐스탄 우라늄 규제 강화
Summary: 카자흐스탄 대통령이 2025년 12월 26일 우라늄 채굴 법안을 공식 서명했어요. 주요 내용은 새로 발견된 우라늄 광상의 국영기업(카자톰프롬)의 소유비율을 크게 높인 거. 외국 기업의 참여도 제한된 거죠. 또한 1월 1일부터 새로운 세무 코드가 시행돼서 로열티 시스템도 바뀌었어요(광석 13%, 정광 10%, 최종 제품 7%). Silk Road(사란) 공장 입장: 우라늄과 직접 관계는 없지만 카자흐의 광물 정책이 전반적으로 보호주의화하고 있다는 신호예요. 세탁기 생산에 필요한 철강·구리 수입도 점점 어려워질 가능성. 대응: Silk Road는 정치·경제 리스크 모니터링 강화. 협력사 다변화 및 공급선 재검토 필수. 액션: ① Silk Road 현지 담당자에 정부 정책 변화 모니터링 강화 ② 협력사 가격·공급 리스크 평가 (기한 2026-02-10) ③ 공급선 대체 국가(우즈베키스탄, 러시아) 발굴 (기한 2026-03-01) (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-02-05). 참고: 카자흐정부공시+1, Mining.com+2
Title_en: Kazakhstan strengthens uranium regulations
Summary_en: The President of Kazakhstan officially signed a law on uranium mining on December 26, 2025. Key changes include significantly increasing the ownership of newly discovered uranium deposits by the state-owned Kazatomprom company, while limiting foreign participation. Furthermore, a new tax code took effect on January 1, changing the royalty system (13% for ore, 10% for concentrate, and 7% for finished products). The Silk Road (Saran) plant's position: While not directly related to uranium, this signals a shift toward protectionism in Kazakhstan's overall mineral policy. Imports of steel and copper, necessary for washing machine production, are also likely to become increasingly difficult. Silk Road will strengthen its monitoring of political and economic risks. Diversifying its partner network and reviewing its supply chain are essential. Actions: ① Strengthen monitoring of government policy changes by local Silk Road officials. ② Assess partner price and supply risks (deadline: February 10, 2026). ③ Identify alternative supply chains (Uzbekistan, Russia) (deadline: March 1, 2026). (Priority: High, Deadline: February 5, 2026). Reference: Kazakhstan Government Disclosure +1, Mining.com +2
Tag_en: Kazakh, uranium, regulation, Tax, Silk Road, Saran

Title: LG 원가율 67.8% 달성
Summary: LG가 2025년 Q4 분기 실적에서 원가율을 전분기 68.2%에서 67.8%로 개선했어요. 2025년 연간 매출 89조 2,025억원 달성하며 연간 매출 역대 최대를 기록했지만, 영업이익은 27.5% 감소했어요. 생활가전 부문에서 프리미염 제품과 구독 사업 성장이 원가 절감의 주요 동력이었어요. 삼성 관점: LG의 원가율 개선이 분기 0.4% 진행되면, 같은 BOM 기준 삼성이 연간 약 50~80억 원 경쟁 압력을 받을 수 있어요. 다만 LG의 영업이익 감소는 마케팅 비용 증가와 구조조정 비용 때문으로, 근본적인 원가 구조 개선보다는 사업 믹스 최적화 차원이에요. 삼성의 대응: ① LG 실적 상세 분석(원재료비 비중 추출, 지역별 원가 비교) ② 광주·SEHAM 협력사 벤치마크 자료 작성 ③ 냉매·철강 공급사 원가 협상 기한 단축(2주 내 협상 개시) (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-01-27). 참고: LG실적공시+2
Title_en: LG achieved a cost ratio of 67.8%
Summary_en: LG improved its cost ratio from 68.2% in the previous quarter to 67.8% in its Q4 2025 earnings. While annual sales reached a record high of KRW 89.2025 trillion in 2025, operating profit decreased by 27.5%. In the home appliances sector, premium products and subscription business growth were the primary drivers of cost reduction. From Samsung's perspective, if LG's cost ratio improves by 0.4% quarterly, Samsung could face approximately KRW 5-8 billion in annual competitive pressure based on the same BOM. However, LG's operating profit decline is due to increased marketing and restructuring costs, reflecting business mix optimization rather than fundamental cost structure improvements. Samsung's response: ① Detailed analysis of LG's performance (extracting raw material cost ratios and comparing costs by region); ② Preparation of benchmark data for Gwangju and SEHAM partners; ③ Shortening of the cost negotiation deadline with refrigerant and steel suppliers (negotiations to begin within two weeks) (Priority: High; Deadline: January 27, 2026). Reference: LG Performance Disclosure +2
Tag_en: LG, Cost rate, 67.8%, Home appliances, Highest sales ever, Cost reduction

Title: GE 미국 재정착 및 자동화 투자 확대
Summary: GE Appliances가 미국 내 제조 거점에 향후 5년간 30억 달러 이상을 투자하기로 발표했어요. 이는 회사 역사상 2번째 규모 투자로, 2016년 이후 총 65억 달러를 U.S. 제조에 투입하게 돼요. 냉방기·온수기 포트폴리오 확대와 11개 미국 공장 자동화 현대화가 주요 내용이에요. 멕시코에서 생산하던 가스 레인지를 조지아로 옮기고, 중국산 냉장고 6개 모델을 앨라배마로 인소싱하는 등 공급선 다변화 가속화해요. 삼성 관점: GE의 공급선 재편이 중국·멕시코 공급사의 경쟁력 약화로 이어질 수 있어요. 하지만 반대로 U.S. 로컬 공급사 수급이 타이트해질 가능성도 있어요 → 삼성의 베트남·인도네시아 공급 다변화 기회 확대. 액션: ① GE 투자 발표의 영향받을 글로벌 공급사 리스트업 ② 삼성 냉방·온수 부문 원가 경쟁력 분석(vs GE 온실링 비용) ③ SEHAM·SEHA 인도네시아·베트남 공급선 확대 속도 조정(2026-02-15까지 계약 갱신 완료) (우선순위: 중, 기한: 2026-02-10). 참고: GE실적공시+1, SupplyChainDive+1
Title_en: GE Expands Investment in US Resettlement and Automation
Summary_en: GE Appliances announced plans to invest more than $3 billion in its U.S. manufacturing operations over the next five years. This represents the second-largest investment in the company's history, bringing its total investment in U.S. manufacturing since 2016 to $6.5 billion. Key initiatives include expanding its air conditioner and water heater portfolio and modernizing automation at 11 U.S. plants. The company is also accelerating supply diversification, including relocating gas ranges from Mexico to Georgia and insourcing six Chinese refrigerator models to Alabama. From Samsung's perspective, GE's supply chain restructuring could weaken the competitiveness of its Chinese and Mexican suppliers. However, it could also tighten supply from U.S. local suppliers, expanding opportunities for Samsung to diversify its supply chains in Vietnam and Indonesia. Actions: ① List global suppliers affected by GE's investment announcement; ② Analyze cost competitiveness of Samsung's cooling and heating systems (vs. GE's greenhouse gas costs); and ③ Adjust the pace of expansion of SEHAM and SEHA's Indonesia and Vietnam supply chains (contract renewal completed by February 15, 2026). (Priority: Medium; Deadline: February 10, 2026). References: GE earnings release +1, SupplyChainDive +1
Tag_en: GE, Automation, invest, Air conditioner, water heater, Resettlement in the United States

Title: Midea 상반기 매출 15.7% 성장
Summary: Midea Group이 2025년 상반기 매출 2,520억 위안을 기록하며 전년동기 대비 15.7% 성장했어요. 순이익도 260억 위안으로 25% 증가하며 원가 구조 효율화 성과를 보였어요. 소비자 부문 매출 1,670억 위안(13.3% 증), 기업간 거래(ToB) 매출 20% 증가로 다변화 추진 중이에요. 냉매 전환(R290 중심), 공급선 확대(인도네시아·베트남 포함) 전략 가속화해요. 삼성 관점: Midea의 이익률 개선(순이익률 약 10.3%)이 삼성 DA(생활가전) 수익성 기준을 위협할 수 있어요. 특히 냉매 R290 전환으로 비용 절감 효과(R134a 대비 30% 저렴)를 먼저 실현 중이에요 → 삼성도 R600a·R290 전환 속도 가속 필요. 액션: ① Midea 냉매 전략 상세 분석(R290 채택률, 생산 거점별) ② 삼성 냉매 공급사 원가 협상 재개(3월까지 신규 계약 체결 목표) ③ SEHAT 에어컨 부문 원가 절감 목표 상향 조정(분기 0.3% → 0.5%)(우선순위: 중, 기한: 2026-02-20). 참고: Midea실적공시+2, Reuters+1
Title_en: Midea's first-half sales grew 15.7%
Summary_en: Midea Group achieved sales of CNY 252 billion in the first half of 2025, up 15.7% year-on-year. Net profit also increased by 25% to CNY 26 billion, demonstrating the effectiveness of cost structure efficiency. The company is pursuing diversification, with consumer sales reaching CNY 167 billion (up 13.3%) and business-to-business (ToB) sales increasing by 20%. The company is accelerating its strategy of refrigerant conversion (focused on R290) and supply chain expansion (including Indonesia and Vietnam). From Samsung's perspective, Midea's improved profit margin (net profit margin of approximately 10.3%) could threaten Samsung's DA (Home Appliances) profitability benchmark. Specifically, the company is already realizing cost savings (30% lower than R134a) through the transition to R290 refrigerant. Samsung also needs to accelerate its transition from R600a to R290. Actions: ① Detailed analysis of Midea's refrigerant strategy (R290 adoption rate, by production site); ② Resumption of cost negotiations with Samsung's refrigerant supplier (targeting new contract signing by March); ③ Increased cost reduction target for SEHAT's air conditioner division (from 0.3% to 0.5% per quarter) (Priority: Medium; Deadline: February 20, 2026). References: Midea earnings release +2, Reuters +1
Tag_en: Midea, Sales growth, 15.7%, Refrigerant R290, Cost reduction, ToB

Title: Whirlpool 실적 부진, 2026 실적 하향 조정
Summary: Whirlpool이 Q3 2025 실적에서 조정 EBIT 1억8천만 달러(전년 대비 14% 감소)를 기록하며 부진을 보였어요. 2025년 조정 EBIT 가이던스를 9억 달러에서 8억 달러로 11% 하향 조정했고, 프리 캐시플로우 전망도 4억 달러에서 2억 달러로 반으로 줄였어요. 원가율 악화와 마진 압박이 주요 원인이에요. 시장 분석가들은 2026년도 EBIT를 전년 대비 6~8% 추가 감소로 전망 중이에요. 삼성 관점: Whirlpool의 원가 관리 실패가 역으로 협력사 협상력 약화로 이어질 수 있어요. 다만 글로벌 공급사 수급이 타이트해질 가능성은 낮아요. Whirlpool의 부진이 장기화되면 공급선 조정 발표로 이어질 수 있으니 주시 필요. 액션: ① Whirlpool Q4 2025 실적 발표 대기(1월 27일 예정) 및 2026 가이던스 확인 ② Whirlpool이 영향받을 공급사(특히 북미 철강·압축기) 수급 변화 모니터링 ③ 삼성 북미 거점 원가 벤치마크 업데이트(2026-02-15) (우선순위: 중, 기한: 2026-02-10). 참고: Whirlpool공시+1, BofA보고서+1
Title_en: Whirlpool's sluggish performance prompts downward revision of 2026 earnings forecast.
Summary_en: Whirlpool's Q3 2025 results were disappointing, with adjusted EBIT of $180 million (a 14% year-over-year decrease). The company lowered its 2025 adjusted EBIT guidance by 11%, from $900 million to $800 million, and halved its free cash flow forecast from $400 million to $200 million. This decline is primarily due to a deteriorating cost ratio and margin pressure. Market analysts forecast a further 6-8% year-over-year decline in 2026 EBIT. Samsung's perspective: Whirlpool's failure to manage its costs could weaken its bargaining power with suppliers. However, the likelihood of a tightening in global supply is low. If Whirlpool's slump continues, it could lead to an announcement of supply chain adjustments, so watch closely. Actions: ① Wait for Whirlpool's Q4 2025 earnings announcement (scheduled for January 27th) and confirm 2026 guidance. ② Monitor supply and demand dynamics for suppliers affected by Whirlpool (especially North American steel and compressors). ③ Update Samsung's North American cost benchmark (February 15, 2026). (Priority: Medium, Due date: February 10, 2026). References: Whirlpool disclosure +1, BofA report +1
Tag_en: Whirlpool, Cost deterioration, Margin pressure, 2026 downward, North America

Title: BSH 2026 CES 발표, AI 주방 기능 공개
Summary: BSH(Bosch/Siemens)가 CES 2026에서 새로운 인공지능 기능인 'Bosch Cook AI'를 Home Connect 앱에 추가하기로 발표했어요. 북미 시장에 처음으로 코드리스 스틱 청소기를 출시하고, 독일 모터 기반 프리미엄 청소기 포트폴리오를 확대해요. 2024년 기준 BSH 그룹 매출 153억 유로, 직원 5만7천명 규모로 39개 공장에서 생산 중이에요. 삼성 관점: BSH의 AI 통합 전략은 프리미엄 시장 지배력 강화 신호. 삼성도 SmartThings 플랫폼을 통한 AI 가전 통합이 가속화 필요해요. 다만 BSH의 북미 청소기 신제품 출시가 해당 공급사 수급을 타이트하게 할 가능성 낮아요(대부분 내제 또는 유럽 공급원). 액션: ① BSH의 AI/IoT 전략 상세 분석(Home Connect 확대 로드맵) ② 삼성 청소기·조리기기 공급사 포트폴리오 재점검(프리미엄 라인 확대 필요성) ③ 삼성 프리미엄 라인 원가 구조 분석(vs BSH 스핀도프/Gaggenau) (우선순위: 낮음, 기한: 2026-03-15). 참고: BSH공식발표+1, CES공시+1
Title_en: BSH 2026 CES Announcement, AI Kitchen Features Revealed
Summary_en: At CES 2026, BSH (Bosch/Siemens) announced the addition of a new artificial intelligence feature, "Bosch Cook AI," to its Home Connect app. It will launch its first cordless stick vacuum cleaner in the North American market and expand its portfolio of premium vacuum cleaners based on German motors. As of 2024, the BSH Group will have sales of €15.3 billion, employ 57,000 people, and produce vacuum cleaners at 39 factories. From Samsung's perspective, BSH's AI integration strategy signals a strengthening of its dominance in the premium market. Samsung also needs to accelerate the integration of AI into its home appliances through its SmartThings platform. However, BSH's new vacuum cleaner launch in North America is unlikely to tighten supply and demand for its suppliers (most of which are domestically produced or sourced from Europe). Actions: ① Detailed analysis of BSH's AI/IoT strategy (Home Connect expansion roadmap); ② Re-examination of Samsung's vacuum cleaner and cooker supplier portfolio (need for premium line expansion); ③ Analysis of Samsung's premium line cost structure (vs. BSH Spindorf/Gaggenau) (Priority: Low; Deadline: March 15, 2026). References: BSH official announcement +1, CES announcement +1
Tag_en: BSH, Bosch, AI Kitchen, premium, CES2026

Title: Haier 자연냉매 전환 본격화
Summary: Haier가 자연냉매(CO₂, R290) 기반 냉동·냉장 멀티시스템을 국내 주요 대형마트에 설치 완료했어요. 배관 직경을 기존 냉매 대비 65% 단축해 비용 절감 효과(약 40% 연료 절약)를 달성했어요. 구리·스테인리스강관 사용으로 최대 120bar까지 견디는 고압 대응 설계. 향후 유럽·북미 시장 확대 예정이에요. 삼성 관점: Haier의 자연냉매 조기 도입이 비용 경쟁력 우위 확보 신호. 2026년 6월부터 중국 냉장고 에너지 국가표준 강화되면, Haier의 기술 리더십이 가격 협상 무기가 될 수 있어요. 삼성도 R600a·R290 전환 협력사 다변화 필수. 액션: ① Haier 자연냉매 기술 스펙 확인(vs 삼성 R600a 효율) ② 삼성 냉장고 공급사 R600a 전환율 점검 (목표: Q2 2026까지 80% 이상) ③ 냉동유 교체 필요 여부 재검토(기술팀 협의)(우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-02-01). 참고: 냉매기술동향+1, Haier보도자료+1
Title_en: Haier's transition to natural refrigerants begins in earnest.
Summary_en: Haier has completed the installation of a natural refrigerant (CO₂, R290)-based refrigeration and freezing multi-system at major domestic supermarkets. The system reduces pipe diameter by 65% ​​compared to conventional refrigerant systems, resulting in cost savings (approximately 40% in fuel savings). The system is designed for high pressures up to 120 bar, utilizing copper and stainless steel pipes. The company plans to expand into the European and North American markets in the future. From Samsung's perspective, Haier's early adoption of natural refrigerants signals a cost advantage. With China's strengthened national refrigerator energy standards starting in June 2026, Haier's technological leadership could become a price negotiation weapon. Samsung also needs to diversify its suppliers for the R600a and R290 transition. Actions: ① Check Haier's natural refrigerant technology specifications (vs. Samsung R600a efficiency); ② Check Samsung refrigerator supplier's R600a conversion rate (target: 80% or higher by Q2 2026); ③ Reassess the need for refrigerant oil replacement (consult with the technical team) (Priority: High; Deadline: 2026-02-01). References: Refrigerant Technology Trends +1, Haier Press Release +1
Tag_en: Haier, Natural refrigerant, CO2, R290, Cost reduction, eco-friendly

Title: LG 프리미엄 'SKS' 빌트인 전략 강화
Summary: LG전자가 초프리미엄 빌트인 가전 브랜드 'SKS'를 미국 고급 주거 단지에 본격 공급 중이에요. Whirlpool 대비 2만 달러(약 2,900만원) 추가 비용에도 불구하고 신축 아파트 300여 가구 중 90%가 SKS 선택했어요. 컬럼 냉장고 기본 세트 2,500만원부터 시작하며, 1,490만원 와인셀러 등 고급 라인업 확대 추진 중이에요. 2025년 북미 생활가전 부문 매출 2년 연속 64% 이상 성장 기록했어요. 삼성 관점: LG의 프리미엄 시장 지배력 강화가 B2B(빌더) 공급망 구조 변화 신호. 이는 표준화된 원가 구조(MOP) 기준이 아닌 맞춤형 고부가가치 전략으로의 전환을 의미해요. 삼성 DA의 프리미엄 라인 원가 구조도 재검토 필요. 액션: ① LG SKS 공급 계약처(빌더) 리스트업 및 계약 규모 추정 ② 삼성 빌트인 라인(BESPOKE 등) 원가 경쟁력 분석 ③ 프리미엄 공급사 선정 기준 재검토(고급화 투자 필요성 평가)(우선순위: 중, 기한: 2026-03-01). 참고: LG공식발표+1, Herald기사+2
Title_en: LG Strengthens its Premium "SKS" Built-in Strategy
Summary_en: LG Electronics is actively supplying its ultra-premium built-in appliance brand, SKS, to high-end residential complexes in the United States. Despite a $20,000 (approximately KRW 29 million) premium compared to Whirlpool, 90% of the approximately 300 newly built apartments chose SKS. The basic column refrigerator starts at KRW 25 million, and the company is expanding its premium lineup, including a KRW 14.9 million wine cellar. By 2025, LG Electronics forecasts sales in the North American home appliance sector to grow by over 64% for two consecutive years. From Samsung's perspective, LG's strengthened dominance in the premium market signals a shift in the B2B (builder) supply chain structure. This signals a shift from a standardized cost structure (MOP) to a customized, high-value-added strategy. Samsung DA's premium line cost structure also needs to be reexamined. Actions: ① List LG SKS supply contract partners (builders) and estimate contract size; ② Analyze cost competitiveness of Samsung's built-in line (e.g., BESPOKE); and ③ Reexamine the criteria for selecting premium suppliers (evaluate the need for investment in upgrading). (Priority: Medium; Deadline: March 1, 2026). References: LG's official announcement +1, Herald article +2
Tag_en: LG, SKS, premium, Built-in, Luxury, B2B

Title: HRC 940달러, 관세 불확실성
Summary: 어제 HRC가 940.94달러로 소폭 하락했지만, 월초비 +0.31% 유지 중이에요. 연간으로는 +28.37% 강세죠. 문제는 미국 관세 50% 추가 논의가 진행 중인 점이에요. SEHA 세탁기 원가 부담 가중 → 협력사 협상 공간 축소 우려. 삼성 관점: 중국 강철 수출 라이선스 강화(1월 1일부)로 국산 수급 타이트해질 수 있어요. 액션: ① BOM 재계산 (HRC +3% vs +5% 관세 시나리오) ② SEHA 협력사 협상 (가격 상한 3%, 기한 2026-01-27) ③ HRC 선물 헤징 검토 (80% 수준, 상한 950) (우선순위: 중, 기한: 2026-01-27). 참고: TradingEconomics+1, 철강금속신문+1
Title_en: HRC $940, tariff uncertainty
Summary_en: HRC fell slightly yesterday to $940.94, but remains at +0.31% compared to the beginning of the month. It's up +28.37% year-to-date. The problem is the ongoing discussions regarding an additional 50% US tariff. This increases the cost burden on SEHA washing machines, raising concerns about reduced negotiation room for suppliers. Samsung's perspective: The strengthening of Chinese steel export licenses (effective January 1) could tighten domestic supply and demand. Actions: ① Recalculate the BOM (HRC +3% vs. +5% tariff scenarios); ② Negotiations with SEHA suppliers (3% price cap, deadline: January 27, 2026); ③ Review HRC futures hedging (80% level, ceiling: $950) (Priority: Medium; deadline: January 27, 2026). References: TradingEconomics+1, Steel & Metal Newspaper+1
Tag_en: steel, HRC, $940, tariff, Futures hedging

Title: 구리 YoY +40%, 공급 부족 심화
Summary: 어제 COMEX 구리 $5.94/Lbs, 월간 +3.17%로 강세 지속이에요. 연간으로는 +40.95% 급등했어요! BofA는 2026년 구리 $11,100 돌파 예상(최고 $15,000). 공급 부족이 주 원인이에요. SEHA·TSE 구리 사용 제품(세탁기, 에어컨 콘덴서) 원가 크게 올라갈 수 있어요. 삼성 관점: 북미·동남아 법인 구매 비용 급증 → Q1 예산 재편 필수. 미국 관세 40~50% 추가 시 더욱 악화. 액션: ① 구리 공급사 장기계약 협상 (가격 선반영 +3~5%) ② TSE/SEHA 월간 구매량 조정 (상한 +2%) ③ COMEX 선물 헤징 70% (기한 2026-01-28) (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-01-27). 참고: COMEX+1, BofA+1, 금속거래소+1
Title_en: Copper up 40% YoY, with supply shortages deepening.
Summary_en: Yesterday, COMEX copper continued its upward trend, rising 3.17% month-on-month to $5.94/Lbs. Year-on-year, it surged 40.95%! BofA forecasts copper to surpass $11,100 in 2026 (with a high of $15,000). This is primarily due to a supply shortage. SEHA and TSE copper-using products (washing machines, air conditioner condensers) could see a significant increase in costs. Samsung's perspective: Procurement costs for North American and Southeast Asian subsidiaries are expected to surge, necessitating a Q1 budget restructuring. The potential for additional 40-50% US tariffs could exacerbate the situation. Actions include: 1) Negotiating long-term contracts with copper suppliers (prioritizing prices +3-5%), 2) Adjusting TSE/SEHA monthly purchase volumes (up to +2%), and 3) Hedging 70% of COMEX futures (expiration date: January 28, 2026). (Priority: High, Expiration date: January 27, 2026). Note: COMEX+1, BofA+1, Metal Exchange+1
Tag_en: copper, Shortage of supply, +40%, COMEX, stress

Title: 알루미늄 3170달러, 규제 영향
Summary: 어제 LME 알루미늄 3,173.5달러, 일간 +1.15% 상승 중이에요. 월간 +7.39% 강세죠. 중국이 45백만톤 생산 상한을 유지하면서 공급 제약이 지속되고 있어요. 미국 관세 40~50%, EU CBAM 규제까지 겹쳐 원가 부담 커질 거예요. SEDAM(멕시코) 냉장고 원가(알루미늄 비중 3.2%)에 영향 발생 가능. 삼성 관점: SEDAM 협력사 알루미늄 가격 인상 요청 확률 높음 → 네고 준비 필수. 중국 알루미늄 수입 제한 우려. 액션: ① 중국 알루미늄 공급 확보 전략 수립 (기한 2026-01-28) ② SEDAM 협력사 장기계약 갱신 (공급 안정성 우선, 가격 +2% 허용) ③ 대체 재료 검토 (마그네슘, 플라스틱 합성) (우선순위: 중, 기한 2026-02-07). 참고: LME+1, TradingEconomics+1
Title_en: Aluminum at $3,170, Regulatory Impact
Summary_en: Yesterday, the LME aluminum price was $3,173.5, up 1.15% daily and up 7.39% monthly. Supply constraints persist as China maintains its 45 million-ton production cap. The 40-50% US tariff and the EU's CBAM regulations will increase the cost burden. This could impact the cost of SEDAM (Mexico) refrigerators (aluminum content: 3.2%). Samsung's perspective: SEDAM partners are likely to request aluminum price increases → Negotiation preparations are essential. Concerns about Chinese aluminum import restrictions. Actions include: ① Develop a strategy to secure Chinese aluminum supply (deadline: January 28, 2026); ② Renew long-term contracts with SEDAM partners (priority: supply stability, allow a 2% price increase); ③ Review alternative materials (magnesium, plastic composites) (Priority: Medium, deadline: February 7, 2026). References: LME+1, TradingEconomics+1
Tag_en: aluminum, regulation, China upper limit, +7.39%

Title: 냉매 R454B 공급 위기
Summary: 어제도 냉매 상황 심각해요. R454B 가격 $17~20/lb(2026년) → 리테일 실린더 $344.94/20lb로 폭등했어요. Honeywell 42% 관세 surcharge + $4/lb 인상, Chemours $2.85/lb 인상(2025년) 진행 중. 공급 부족으로 리드타임 10~12주 장기화. US 규제 GWP 150 이하 요구하면서 R454B 수요 폭증 → 가격 300% 급등! 광주사업장·SEHC 에어컨 냉매 비용 +20% 이상 상승 확실. 삼성 관점: 냉매 공급사 가격 협상 거의 불가능 → 장기계약·선보유 필수. 액션: ① 냉매 공급사 R454B 확보 전략 (선주문+장기계약, 기한 2026-01-27) ② 광주·호치민 생산 기지 냉매 공급 계약 조기 갱신 (+20% 선반영) ③ 대체 냉매(R32, R290) 호환 모델 개발 로드맵 협의 (기한 2026-02-14) (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-01-27). 참고: Honeywell공식+2, ACHR+1
Title_en: Refrigerant R454B supply crisis
Summary_en: The refrigerant situation was dire yesterday. The price of R454B skyrocketed from $17-20/lb (2026) to $344.94/20lb for a retail cylinder. Honeywell is facing a 42% tariff surcharge and a $4/lb increase, while Chemours is in the process of raising prices by $2.85/lb (2025). Supply shortages are extending lead times to 10-12 weeks. Demand for R454B is skyrocketing due to US regulations requiring a GWP of 150 or lower, leading to a 300% price surge! Refrigerant costs for Gwangju plants and SEHC air conditioners are certain to rise by more than 20%. Samsung's perspective: Price negotiations with refrigerant suppliers are nearly impossible, making long-term contracts and pre-stocking essential. Actions: ① Strategy to secure R454B from refrigerant suppliers (pre-order + long-term contract, due January 27, 2026); ② Early renewal of refrigerant supply contracts for Gwangju and Ho Chi Minh City production bases (+20% advance reflection); ③ Discussion on a roadmap for developing models compatible with alternative refrigerants (R32, R290) (Deadline: February 14, 2026) (Priority: High, Deadline: January 27, 2026). Note: Honeywell official +2, ACHR +1
Tag_en: refrigerant, R454B, +20%, shortage, crisis

Title: 레진 PE·PP 공급 과잉
Summary: 좋은 뉴스예요. PE·PP 가격이 떨어지고 있어요. PE 6,732 CNY/톤, PP 6,548 CNY/톤(1월 23일) 모두 월간 +6~7% 상승했지만, 연간으로는 -10~14% 하락했어요. 중국 석유화학 생산 증가로 공급 과잉 심화 중. 업계 추정 추가 하락 가능성 1~3센트/lb. 광주·SEPM 냉장고 플라스틱 부품(PP 사용) 원가 절감 기회! 삼성 관점: 레진 협력사 가격 인하 협상 적기 → 분기별 BOM 개선 가능. 액션: ① 협력사 레진 가격 인하 협상 (목표 -2~3%, 기한 2026-02-07) ② SCGE(소주) PE/PP 공급사 계약갱신 추진 (기한 2026-02-14) ③ 2026 Q1 BOM 하향 편성 (예상 절감액 +0.3% margin) (우선순위: 중, 기한 2026-01-30). 참고: TradingEconomics+2, PTOnline+1
Title_en: Oversupply of PE and PP resins
Summary_en: Good news. PE and PP prices are falling. PE was CNY 6,732/ton and PP was CNY 6,548/ton (as of January 23), both up 6-7% month-over-month but down 10-14% year-over-year. China's petrochemical production is increasing, leading to a deepening oversupply. Industry estimates suggest a further decline of 1-3 cents/lb. Opportunity to reduce costs for Gwangju and SEPM refrigerator plastic parts (using PP)! Samsung's perspective: Opportunity to negotiate price reductions with resin suppliers → Quarterly BOM improvements possible. Actions: ① Negotiate resin price reductions with suppliers (target -2-3%, deadline 2026-02-07) ② Push for contract renewal with SCGE (Suzhou) PE/PP supplier (deadline 2026-02-14) ③ Downgrade the Q1 2026 BOM (expected savings +0.3% margin) (Priority: Medium, deadline 2026-01-30). References: TradingEconomics+2, PTOnline+1
Tag_en: resin, PE, PP, -0.5%, overabundance, reduction

Title: 트럼프 한국산 관세 25% 인상
Summary: 트럼프 미국 대통령이 26일(현지시간) 한국산 자동차·목재·의약품 상호 관세를 15%에서 25%로 인상한다고 선언했어요. 국회가 무역합의를 비준하지 않았다는 이유라고 밝혔어요. 삼성 관점: 생활가전 사업에 직접 영향은 제한적이지만, 글로벌 경기 둔화 우려와 통상 분쟁 확대 신호로 봐야 해요. 특히 선제적 관세 인상은 향후 철강·구리 등 원자재 관세도 높일 가능성을 시사해요. 액션: ① 트럼프 행정부 관세 계획 상세 분석 (대상 품목 범위 확인) ② 협력사 공급망 리스크 매핑 (미국 수출 의존도 점검) ③ 관세 영향 시나리오 모델링 (5~15% 인상 시 원가 변화) (우선순위: 중, 기한: 2026-02-05) 참고: Bloomberg+1, ZDNet+1, YNA+1
Title_en: Trump raises tariffs on Korean products by 25%
Summary_en: US President Trump announced on the 26th (local time) that he would raise tariffs on Korean automobiles, lumber, and pharmaceuticals from 15% to 25%. He explained that this was because the National Assembly had not ratified the trade agreement. Samsung's perspective: While the direct impact on the home appliance business is limited, it should be viewed as a signal of concerns about a global economic slowdown and an escalating trade dispute. In particular, the preemptive tariff increase suggests the possibility of future increases in tariffs on raw materials such as steel and copper. Actions: ① Detailed analysis of the Trump administration's tariff plan (confirming the scope of target items) ② Supply chain risk mapping of partners (examining dependence on US exports) ③ Tariff impact scenario modeling (cost changes with a 5-15% increase) (Priority: Medium, Deadline: 2026-02-05) References: Bloomberg+1, ZDNet+1, YNA+1
Tag_en: USA, tariff, Made in Korea, 25%, reciprocal tariffs, trade disputes

Title: USD/KRW 1,440원대로 하락
Summary: USD/KRW 환율이 26일 오후 3시 30분 기준 1,440.60원을 기록했어요. 월초 1,430원대에서 큰 변동이 없었던 것처럼 보이지만, 월 중간 1,470원을 넘었던 것에서는 약세가 반영되었어요. 현물시장은 1,440원대이지만 변동성이 높아요. 삼성 관점: 환율이 1,440원대에 머물면서 수입 원자재비 부담이 완화되는 추세예요. 다만 1월 20일 1,478.78원 고점 이후 소폭 하락했으므로 향후 환율 방향성이 중요해요. FOMC 결과(28일)와 트럼프 정책 불확실성이 환율 변동 주요 변수예요. 액션: ① 일일 환율 모니터링 강화 (목표: 1,450원대 유지 여부) ② 협력사별 환율 민감도 재평가 (구리, HRC, 냉매 중심) ③ 원가 협상 기준 재설정 (환율 1,430/1,450/1,470원 시나리오) (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-01-28) 참고: 한국은행+1, Trading Economics+1, SMBS+1
Title_en: USD/KRW fell to 1,440 won
Summary_en: The USD/KRW exchange rate stood at 1,440.60 won as of 3:30 p.m. on the 26th. While it appears to have remained largely stable from the 1,430 won range at the beginning of the month, the mid-month high of over 1,470 won reflects weakness. The spot market remains in the 1,440 won range, but volatility remains high. Samsung's perspective: With the exchange rate hovering around the 1,440 won range, the burden of imported raw material costs is easing. However, given the slight decline since its peak of 1,478.78 won on January 20th, the future direction of the exchange rate is crucial. The FOMC outcome (28th) and uncertainty about Trump's policy are key variables influencing exchange rate fluctuations. Actions: ① Strengthen daily exchange rate monitoring (target: maintain the 1,450 won level) ② Reassess exchange rate sensitivity by partner company (focusing on copper, HRC, and refrigerants) ③ Reset cost negotiation criteria (exchange rate scenarios of 1,430/1,450/1,470 won) (Priority: High, Deadline: 2026-01-28) Reference: Bank of Korea+1, Trading Economics+1, SMBS+1
Tag_en: Exchange rate, USD/KRW, 1440 won, stress, degradation, -2.1%, Import price reduction

Title: FOMC 1월 28일 금리 동결 97% 확률
Summary: FOMC가 1월 27~28일 회의를 개최하고 28일 오후 2시(미국 동부시간, 한국 시간 29일 오전 4시) 금리 결정을 발표할 거예요. CME 페드워치 기준으로 금리 동결 확률이 97.2%까지 올랐어요. 현재 기준금리는 3.50~3.75%일 거고요. 삼성 관점: 1월 동결 확률 97%는 사실상 금리 인상이 아닌지는 불확실하지만, 추가 인하는 당분간 어렵다는 신호예요. 달러 강세 기조가 이어질 가능성 높아요. Fed 의장 파월의 기자회견 톤(매파 vs 비둘기파)이 환율·금리 시장에 미칠 영향 커요. 액션: ① FOMC 결정 발표 및 성명서 분석 (매파 기조 확인) ② 파월 기자회견 톤 모니터링 (3월 금리 인상/동결/인하 신호 파악) ③ 시장 반응 추적 (환율, 달러 지수, 미국 국채 수익률) (우선순위: 중, 기한: 2026-01-29 오전 10시) 참고: CME공식발표+1, Fed공식발표+1, BNT뉴스+1
Title_en: 97% chance that the FOMC will hold rates steady on January 28th
Summary_en: The FOMC will meet on January 27th and 28th and announce its interest rate decision at 2:00 PM ET on the 28th (4:00 AM KST on the 29th). According to the CME FedWatch, the probability of a rate freeze has risen to 97.2%. The current benchmark interest rate is expected to be between 3.50% and 3.75%. Samsung's perspective: While the 97% probability of a January freeze makes it uncertain whether a rate hike will actually occur, it signals that further cuts are unlikely for the time being. The dollar's strength is likely to continue. The tone (hawkish vs. dovish) of Fed Chair Powell's press conference will have a significant impact on the exchange rate and interest rate markets. Actions: ① Analyze the FOMC decision announcement and statement (confirm the hawkish tone) ② Monitor the tone of Powell's press conference (identify signals for a March rate hike/freeze/cut) ③ Track market reactions (exchange rate, dollar index, U.S. Treasury yields) (Priority: Medium, Deadline: 2026-01-29 10:00 AM) References: CME official announcement +1, Fed official announcement +1, BNT news +1
Tag_en: Fed, interest rates, 3.75%, freezing, 97%, monetary policy

Title: 인도 전국 파업 예정
Summary: 인도 노조가 신 노동법 반대로 2월 12일 전국 대규모 파업을 예정했어요. 철강노조는 RINL 비샤카파트남 제철소에서도 임금 +15% 인상을 요구하며 파업을 예고했어요. SIEL-P 첸나이 공장은 인도산 철강 공급사에 70% 의존도가 있어서 → 냉장고·세탁기·에어컨 생산 차질 2~3주 우려돼요. 동시에 인도 철강 수입가도 +15% 상승 압박 받을 것 같아요. 대응: SIEL-P는 현재 인도 협력사와 파업 대비 안전재고 협의 중. 베트남·태국 공급선 긴급 확보 검토 필요해요. 액션: ① SIEL-P 현지 담당자와 파업 일정·영향도 확인 ② 철강 협력사별 비축량 재검토 및 안전재고 증가 ③ 베트남·태국 철강사 긴급 협상 일정 설정 (기한 2026-01-28) (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-01-28). 참고: 인도현지언론+2, Reuters+1
Title_en: Nationwide strike planned in India
Summary_en: Indian unions have scheduled a nationwide strike on February 12th to protest new labor laws. The steel union has also announced a strike at the RINL Visakhapatnam steel plant, demanding a 15% wage increase. SIEL-P's Chennai plant relies 70% on Indian steel suppliers, raising concerns that production of refrigerators, washing machines, and air conditioners could be disrupted for two to three weeks. At the same time, Indian steel import prices are also expected to rise by 15%. Response: SIEL-P is currently discussing safety stocks with its Indian partners in preparation for the strike. Urgent consideration of securing supply lines in Vietnam and Thailand is needed. Actions: ① Confirm the strike schedule and impact with SIEL-P's local staff. ② Review stockpiles and increase safety stocks at each steel partner. ③ Set a date for urgent negotiations with Vietnamese and Thai steel companies (Deadline: January 28, 2026) (Priority: High, Deadline: January 28, 2026). Reference: Indian local media +2, Reuters +1
Tag_en: India, strike, wages, steel, labor, SIEL-P, supply disruption

Title: 폴란드 전기료 대폭 인상
Summary: 폴란드가 2026년 1월 1일부터 전기료를 대폭 인상했어요. 산업용 용량비가 +55.38% 올랐고, B21 산업 고객용 전기료가 평균 +21.16% 인상됐대요. SEPM 브론키 공장의 에너지 비용 부담이 커질 거 같아요. 냉장고·세탁기 생산의 원가 상승 압박이 발생해요. 대응: SEPM은 협력사 전기료 인상분을 협상에 반영하고, 에너지 효율 개선 설비 투자 검토 필요해요. 현재 SEPM의 월 전력비 재계산이 시급해요. 액션: ① SEPM 현지 담당자에 전기료 구체적 인상분 확인 ② 브론키 공장 월 전력비 재계산 및 BOM 영향도 평가 ③ 에너지 효율 개선 기술 도입 비용-편익 분석 (기한 2026-02-15) (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-02-01). 참고: 폴란드에너지규제공시+1, Bloomberg+2
Title_en: Poland's electricity prices rise sharply
Summary_en: Poland has significantly increased electricity rates, effective January 1, 2026. Industrial capacity rates have increased by 55.38%, and electricity rates for B21 industrial customers have increased by an average of 21.16%. This is expected to significantly increase the energy costs for SEPM's Wronki plant, putting upward pressure on the production costs of refrigerators and washing machines. Response: SEPM needs to reflect the increased electricity rates with its partners in negotiations and consider investing in energy efficiency improvement facilities. Currently, SEPM urgently needs to recalculate its monthly electricity costs. Actions: ① Confirm the specific amount of the electricity rate increase with SEPM's local representative. ② Recalculate the monthly electricity costs for the Wronki plant and assess the impact on the bill of materials. ③ Cost-benefit analysis of the introduction of energy efficiency improvement technologies (Deadline: February 15, 2026) (Priority: High, Deadline: February 1, 2026). References: Polish Energy Regulatory Notice +1, Bloomberg +2
Tag_en: Poland, Electricity bill, +55%, Capacity ratio, SEPM, Energy costs

Title: 태국 구리 가격 급등
Summary: 글로벌 구리 가격이 역대 최고가를 경신했어요. LME 구리가 $13,200~13,300/톤으로 오르면서 태국도 영향 받았어요. 태국 국내 구리 가격이 330~350 THB/kg으로 상승했대요.
